english: O you who have believed, avoid much [negative] assumption. Indeed, some assumption is sin. And do not spy or backbite each other. Would one of you like to eat the flesh of his brother when dead? You would detest it. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is Accepting of repentance and Merciful.

arabic: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَـٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرࣲ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلۡنَـٰكُمۡ شُعُوبࣰا وَقَبَاۤىِٕلَ لِتَعَارَفُوۤا۟ۚ إِنَّ أَكۡرَمَكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتۡقَىٰكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِیمٌ خَبِیرࣱ
english: O mankind, indeed We have created you from male and female and made you peoples and tribes that you may know one another. Indeed, the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous of you. Indeed, Allah is Knowing and Acquainted.

arabic: ۞ قَالَتِ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ ءَامَنَّاۖ قُل لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُوا۟ وَلَـٰكِن قُولُوۤا۟ أَسۡلَمۡنَا وَلَمَّا یَدۡخُلِ ٱلۡإِیمَـٰنُ فِی قُلُوبِكُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِیعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا یَلِتۡكُم مِّنۡ أَعۡمَـٰلِكُمۡ شَیۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمٌ
english: The bedouins say, "We have believed." Say, "You have not [yet] believed; but say [instead], 'We have submitted,' for faith has not yet entered your hearts. And if you obey Allah and His Messenger, He will not deprive you from your deeds of anything. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful."

arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ لَمۡ یَرۡتَابُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
english: The believers are only the ones who have believed in Allah and His Messenger and then doubt not but strive with their properties and their lives in the cause of Allah. It is those who are the truthful.

arabic: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِینِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ یَعۡلَمُ مَا فِی ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَمَا فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَیۡءٍ عَلِیمࣱ
english: Say, "Would you acquaint Allah with your religion while Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and Allah is Knowing of all things?"

arabic: یَمُنُّونَ عَلَیۡكَ أَنۡ أَسۡلَمُوا۟ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا۟ عَلَیَّ إِسۡلَـٰمَكُمۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ یَمُنُّ عَلَیۡكُمۡ أَنۡ هَدَىٰكُمۡ لِلۡإِیمَـٰنِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَـٰدِقِینَ
english: They consider it a favor to you that they have accepted Islam. Say, "Do not consider your Islam a favor to me. Rather, Allah has conferred favor upon you that He has guided you to the faith, if you should be truthful."

arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ یَعۡلَمُ غَیۡبَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِیرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
english: Indeed, Allah knows the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Seeing of what you do.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ قۤۚ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡمَجِیدِ
english: Qaf. By the honored Qur'an...

arabic: بَلۡ عَجِبُوۤا۟ أَن جَاۤءَهُم مُّنذِرࣱ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَیۡءٌ عَجِیبٌ
english: But they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, and the disbelievers say, "This is an amazing thing.

arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابࣰاۖ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِیدࣱ
english: When we have died and have become dust, [we will return to life]? That is a distant return."

arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِیظُۢ
english: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.

arabic: بَلۡ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاۤءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِیۤ أَمۡرࣲ مَّرِیجٍ
english: But they denied the truth when it came to them, so they are in a confused condition.

arabic: أَفَلَمۡ یَنظُرُوۤا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَیۡفَ بَنَیۡنَـٰهَا وَزَیَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجࣲ
english: Have they not looked at the heaven above them - how We structured it and adorned it and [how] it has no rifts?

arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَـٰهَا وَأَلۡقَیۡنَا فِیهَا رَوَ ٰ⁠سِیَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِیهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجِۭ بَهِیجࣲ
english: And the earth - We spread it out and cast therein firmly set mountains and made grow therein [something] of every beautiful kind,

arabic: تَبۡصِرَةࣰ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبۡدࣲ مُّنِیبࣲ
english: Giving insight and a reminder for every servant who turns [to Allah].

arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ مَاۤءࣰ مُّبَـٰرَكࣰا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِیدِ
english: And We have sent down blessed rain from the sky and made grow thereby gardens and grain from the harvest

arabic: وَٱلنَّخۡلَ بَاسِقَـٰتࣲ لَّهَا طَلۡعࣱ نَّضِیدࣱ
english: And lofty palm trees having fruit arranged in layers -

arabic: رِّزۡقࣰا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡیَیۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةࣰ مَّیۡتࣰاۚ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ
english: As provision for the servants, and We have given life thereby to a dead land. Thus is the resurrection.

arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحࣲ وَأَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
english: The people of Noah denied before them, and the companions of the well and Thamud

arabic: وَعَادࣱ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ وَإِخۡوَ ٰ⁠نُ لُوطࣲ
english: And 'Aad and Pharaoh and the brothers of Lot

arabic: وَأَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡأَیۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعࣲۚ كُلࣱّ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِیدِ
english: And the companions of the thicket and the people of Tubba'. All denied the messengers, so My threat was justly fulfilled.

arabic: أَفَعَیِینَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِی لَبۡسࣲ مِّنۡ خَلۡقࣲ جَدِیدࣲ
english: Did We fail in the first creation? But they are in confusion over a new creation.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ وَنَعۡلَمُ مَا تُوَسۡوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفۡسُهُۥۖ وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَیۡهِ مِنۡ حَبۡلِ ٱلۡوَرِیدِ
english: And We have already created man and know what his soul whispers to him, and We are closer to him than [his] jugular vein

arabic: إِذۡ یَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّیَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡیَمِینِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِیدࣱ
english: When the two receivers receive, seated on the right and on the left.

arabic: مَّا یَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَیۡهِ رَقِیبٌ عَتِیدࣱ
english: Man does not utter any word except that with him is an observer prepared [to record].

arabic: وَجَاۤءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِیدُ
english: And the intoxication of death will bring the truth; that is what you were trying to avoid.

arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِی ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ یَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِیدِ
english: And the Horn will be blown. That is the Day of [carrying out] the threat.

arabic: وَجَاۤءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسࣲ مَّعَهَا سَاۤىِٕقࣱ وَشَهِیدࣱ
english: And every soul will come, with it a driver and a witness.

arabic: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِی غَفۡلَةࣲ مِّنۡ هَـٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَاۤءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡیَوۡمَ حَدِیدࣱ
english: [It will be said], "You were certainly in unmindfulness of this, and We have removed from you your cover, so your sight, this Day, is sharp."

arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِینُهُۥ هَـٰذَا مَا لَدَیَّ عَتِیدٌ
english: And his companion, [the angel], will say, "This [record] is what is with me, prepared."

arabic: أَلۡقِیَا فِی جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِیدࣲ
english: [Allah will say], "Throw into Hell every obstinate disbeliever,

arabic: مَّنَّاعࣲ لِّلۡخَیۡرِ مُعۡتَدࣲ مُّرِیبٍ
english: Preventer of good, aggressor, and doubter,

arabic: ٱلَّذِی جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِیَاهُ فِی ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِیدِ
english: Who made [as equal] with Allah another deity; then throw him into the severe punishment."

arabic: ۞ قَالَ قَرِینُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَاۤ أَطۡغَیۡتُهُۥ وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ فِی ضَلَـٰلِۭ بَعِیدࣲ
english: His [devil] companion will say, "Our Lord, I did not make him transgress, but he [himself] was in extreme error."

arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُوا۟ لَدَیَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَیۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِیدِ
english: [Allah] will say, "Do not dispute before Me, while I had already presented to you the warning.

arabic: مَا یُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَیَّ وَمَاۤ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمࣲ لِّلۡعَبِیدِ
english: The word will not be changed with Me, and never will I be unjust to the servants."

arabic: یَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِیدࣲ
english: On the Day We will say to Hell, "Have you been filled?" and it will say, "Are there some more,"

arabic: وَأُزۡلِفَتِ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِینَ غَیۡرَ بَعِیدٍ
english: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far,

arabic: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِیظࣲ
english: [It will be said], "This is what you were promised - for every returner [to Allah] and keeper [of His covenant]

arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِیَ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنَ بِٱلۡغَیۡبِ وَجَاۤءَ بِقَلۡبࣲ مُّنِیبٍ
english: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].

arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمࣲۖ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ یَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُلُودِ
english: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of Eternity."

arabic: لَهُم مَّا یَشَاۤءُونَ فِیهَا وَلَدَیۡنَا مَزِیدࣱ
english: They will have whatever they wish therein, and with Us is more.

arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشࣰا فَنَقَّبُوا۟ فِی ٱلۡبِلَـٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِیصٍ
english: And how many a generation before them did We destroy who were greater than them in [striking] power and had explored throughout the lands. Is there any place of escape?

arabic: إِنَّ فِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِیدࣱ
english: Indeed in that is a reminder for whoever has a heart or who listens while he is present [in mind].

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَیۡنَهُمَا فِی سِتَّةِ أَیَّامࣲ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبࣲ
english: And We did certainly create the heavens and earth and what is between them in six days, and there touched Us no weariness.

arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا یَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ
english: So be patient, [O Muhammad], over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting,

arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّیۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَأَدۡبَـٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ
english: And [in part] of the night exalt Him and after prostration.

arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ یَوۡمَ یُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانࣲ قَرِیبࣲ
english: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -

arabic: یَوۡمَ یَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّیۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ یَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ
english: The Day they will hear the blast [of the Horn] in truth. That is the Day of Emergence [from the graves].

arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡیِۦ وَنُمِیتُ وَإِلَیۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِیرُ
english: Indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and to Us is the destination

arabic: یَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعࣰاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَیۡنَا یَسِیرࣱ
english: On the Day the earth breaks away from them [and they emerge] rapidly; that is a gathering easy for Us.

arabic: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا یَقُولُونَۖ وَمَاۤ أَنتَ عَلَیۡهِم بِجَبَّارࣲۖ فَذَكِّرۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَن یَخَافُ وَعِیدِ
english: We are most knowing of what they say, and you are not over them a tyrant. But remind by the Qur'an whoever fears My threat.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلذَّ ٰ⁠رِیَـٰتِ ذَرۡوࣰا
english: By those [winds] scattering [dust] dispersing

arabic: فَٱلۡحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقۡرࣰا
english: And those [clouds] carrying a load [of water]

arabic: فَٱلۡجَـٰرِیَـٰتِ یُسۡرࣰا
english: And those [ships] sailing with ease

arabic: فَٱلۡمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمۡرًا
english: And those [angels] apportioning [each] matter,

arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقࣱ
english: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّینَ لَوَ ٰ⁠قِعࣱ
english: And indeed, the recompense is to occur.

arabic: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡحُبُكِ
english: By the heaven containing pathways,

arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِی قَوۡلࣲ مُّخۡتَلِفࣲ
english: Indeed, you are in differing speech.

arabic: یُؤۡفَكُ عَنۡهُ مَنۡ أُفِكَ
english: Deluded away from the Qur'an is he who is deluded.

arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلۡخَرَّ ٰ⁠صُونَ
english: Destroyed are the falsifiers

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ فِی غَمۡرَةࣲ سَاهُونَ
english: Who are within a flood [of confusion] and heedless.

arabic: یَسۡـَٔلُونَ أَیَّانَ یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ
english: They ask, "When is the Day of Recompense?"

arabic: یَوۡمَ هُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ یُفۡتَنُونَ
english: [It is] the Day they will be tormented over the Fire

arabic: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
english: [And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَعُیُونٍ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and springs,

arabic: ءَاخِذِینَ مَاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ قَبۡلَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ مُحۡسِنِینَ
english: Accepting what their Lord has given them. Indeed, they were before that doers of good.

arabic: كَانُوا۟ قَلِیلࣰا مِّنَ ٱلَّیۡلِ مَا یَهۡجَعُونَ
english: They used to sleep but little of the night,

arabic: وَبِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ هُمۡ یَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ
english: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,

arabic: وَفِیۤ أَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِهِمۡ حَقࣱّ لِّلسَّاۤىِٕلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ
english: And from their properties was [given] the right of the [needy] petitioner and the deprived.

arabic: وَفِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ءَایَـٰتࣱ لِّلۡمُوقِنِینَ
english: And on the earth are signs for the certain [in faith]

arabic: وَفِیۤ أَنفُسِكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
english: And in yourselves. Then will you not see?

arabic: وَفِی ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ رِزۡقُكُمۡ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ
english: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.

arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقࣱّ مِّثۡلَ مَاۤ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ
english: Then by the Lord of the heaven and earth, indeed, it is truth - just as [sure as] it is that you are speaking.

arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ ضَیۡفِ إِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِینَ
english: Has there reached you the story of the honored guests of Abraham? -

arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَیۡهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمࣰاۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمࣱ قَوۡمࣱ مُّنكَرُونَ
english: When they entered upon him and said, "[We greet you with] peace." He answered, "[And upon you] peace, [you are] a people unknown.

arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَاۤءَ بِعِجۡلࣲ سَمِینࣲ
english: Then he went to his family and came with a fat [roasted] calf

arabic: فَقَرَّبَهُۥۤ إِلَیۡهِمۡ قَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
english: And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"

arabic: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِیفَةࣰۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِیمࣲ
english: And he felt from them apprehension. They said, "Fear not," and gave him good tidings of a learned boy.

arabic: فَأَقۡبَلَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ فِی صَرَّةࣲ فَصَكَّتۡ وَجۡهَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَقِیمࣱ
english: And his wife approached with a cry [of alarm] and struck her face and said, "[I am] a barren old woman!"

arabic: قَالُوا۟ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِیمُ ٱلۡعَلِیمُ
english: They said, "Thus has said your Lord; indeed, He is the Wise, the Knowing."

arabic: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَیُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
english: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"

arabic: قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّاۤ أُرۡسِلۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمࣲ مُّجۡرِمِینَ
english: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals

arabic: لِنُرۡسِلَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةࣰ مِّن طِینࣲ
english: To send down upon them stones of clay,

arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِینَ
english: Marked in the presence of your Lord for the transgressors."

arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِیهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ
english: So We brought out whoever was in the cities of the believers.

arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِیهَا غَیۡرَ بَیۡتࣲ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِینَ
english: And We found not within them other than a [single] house of Muslims.

arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِیهَاۤ ءَایَةࣰ لِّلَّذِینَ یَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِیمَ
english: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.

arabic: وَفِی مُوسَىٰۤ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَـٰنࣲ مُّبِینࣲ
english: And in Moses [was a sign], when We sent him to Pharaoh with clear authority.

arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونࣱ
english: But he turned away with his supporters and said," A magician or a madman."

arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَـٰهُمۡ فِی ٱلۡیَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِیمࣱ
english: So We took him and his soldiers and cast them into the sea, and he was blameworthy.

arabic: وَفِی عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلرِّیحَ ٱلۡعَقِیمَ
english: And in 'Aad [was a sign], when We sent against them the barren wind.

arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَیۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَیۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِیمِ
english: It left nothing of what it came upon but that it made it like disintegrated ruins.

arabic: وَفِی ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِیلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِینࣲ
english: And in Thamud, when it was said to them, "Enjoy yourselves for a time."

arabic: فَعَتَوۡا۟ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ یَنظُرُونَ
english: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.

arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِیَامࣲ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِینَ
english: And they were unable to arise, nor could they defend themselves.

arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحࣲ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ قَوۡمࣰا فَـٰسِقِینَ
english: And [We destroyed] the people of Noah before; indeed, they were a people defiantly disobedient.

arabic: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءَ بَنَیۡنَـٰهَا بِأَیۡی۟دࣲ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
english: And the heaven We constructed with strength, and indeed, We are [its] expander.

arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَرَشۡنَـٰهَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَـٰهِدُونَ
english: And the earth We have spread out, and excellent is the preparer.

arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَیۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَیۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ
english: And of all things We created two mates; perhaps you will remember.

arabic: فَفِرُّوۤا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّی لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینࣱ
english: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّی لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینࣱ
english: And do not make [as equal] with Allah another deity. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.

arabic: كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ مَاۤ أَتَى ٱلَّذِینَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ
english: Similarly, there came not to those before them any messenger except that they said, "A magician or a madman."

arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ طَاغُونَ
english: Did they suggest it to them? Rather, they [themselves] are a transgressing people.

arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَمَاۤ أَنتَ بِمَلُومࣲ
english: So leave them, [O Muhammad], for you are not to be blamed.

arabic: وَذَكِّرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ
english: And remind, for indeed, the reminder benefits the believers.

arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِیَعۡبُدُونِ
english: And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

arabic: مَاۤ أُرِیدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقࣲ وَمَاۤ أُرِیدُ أَن یُطۡعِمُونِ
english: I do not want from them any provision, nor do I want them to feed Me.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِینُ
english: Indeed, it is Allah who is the [continual] Provider, the firm possessor of strength.

arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِینَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبࣰا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَـٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا یَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ
english: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a portion [of punishment] like the portion of their predecessors, so let them not impatiently urge Me.

arabic: فَوَیۡلࣱ لِّلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن یَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِی یُوعَدُونَ
english: And woe to those who have disbelieved from their Day which they are promised.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلطُّورِ
english: By the mount

arabic: وَكِتَـٰبࣲ مَّسۡطُورࣲ
english: And [by] a Book inscribed

arabic: فِی رَقࣲّ مَّنشُورࣲ
english: In parchment spread open

arabic: وَٱلۡبَیۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡمُورِ
english: And [by] the frequented House

arabic: وَٱلسَّقۡفِ ٱلۡمَرۡفُوعِ
english: And [by] the heaven raised high

arabic: وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ ٱلۡمَسۡجُورِ
english: And [by] the sea filled [with fire],

arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَ ٰ⁠قِعࣱ
english: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur.

arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعࣲ
english: Of it there is no preventer.

arabic: یَوۡمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ مَوۡرࣰا
english: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

arabic: وَتَسِیرُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ سَیۡرࣰا
english: And the mountains will pass on, departing -

arabic: فَوَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers,

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ هُمۡ فِی خَوۡضࣲ یَلۡعَبُونَ
english: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves.

arabic: یَوۡمَ یُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
english: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say],

arabic: هَـٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِی كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
english: "This is the Fire which you used to deny.

arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَـٰذَاۤ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
english: Then is this magic, or do you not see?

arabic: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَٱصۡبِرُوۤا۟ أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُوا۟ سَوَاۤءٌ عَلَیۡكُمۡۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
english: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do."

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَنَعِیمࣲ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure,

arabic: فَـٰكِهِینَ بِمَاۤ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِیمِ
english: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire.

arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشۡرَبُوا۟ هَنِیۤـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
english: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔینَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرࣲ مَّصۡفُوفَةࣲۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِینࣲ
english: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

arabic: وَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّیَّتُهُم بِإِیمَـٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّیَّتَهُمۡ وَمَاۤ أَلَتۡنَـٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَیۡءࣲۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِىِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِینࣱ
english: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained.

arabic: وَأَمۡدَدۡنَـٰهُم بِفَـٰكِهَةࣲ وَلَحۡمࣲ مِّمَّا یَشۡتَهُونَ
english: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire.

arabic: یَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ فِیهَا كَأۡسࣰا لَّا لَغۡوࣱ فِیهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِیمࣱ
english: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin.

arabic: ۞ وَیَطُوفُ عَلَیۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانࣱ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤࣱ مَّكۡنُونࣱ
english: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected.

arabic: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضࣲ یَتَسَاۤءَلُونَ
english: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other.

arabic: قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِیۤ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِینَ
english: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah].

arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَیۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
english: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire.

arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِیمُ
english: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful."

arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَاۤ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنࣲ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ
english: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman.

arabic: أَمۡ یَقُولُونَ شَاعِرࣱ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَیۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
english: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time?"

arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُوا۟ فَإِنِّی مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِینَ
english: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters."

arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَـٰمُهُم بِهَـٰذَاۤۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمࣱ طَاغُونَ
english: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people?

arabic: أَمۡ یَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا یُؤۡمِنُونَ
english: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe.

arabic: فَلۡیَأۡتُوا۟ بِحَدِیثࣲ مِّثۡلِهِۦۤ إِن كَانُوا۟ صَـٰدِقِینَ
english: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful.

arabic: أَمۡ خُلِقُوا۟ مِنۡ غَیۡرِ شَیۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَـٰلِقُونَ
english: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]?

arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُوا۟ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا یُوقِنُونَ
english: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain.

arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَاۤىِٕنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۣیۡطِرُونَ
english: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]?

arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّمࣱ یَسۡتَمِعُونَ فِیهِۖ فَلۡیَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُهُم بِسُلۡطَـٰنࣲ مُّبِینٍ
english: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority.

arabic: أَمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡبَنَـٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡبَنُونَ
english: Or has He daughters while you have sons?

arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرࣰا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمࣲ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
english: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down?

arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَیۡبُ فَهُمۡ یَكۡتُبُونَ
english: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down?

arabic: أَمۡ یُرِیدُونَ كَیۡدࣰاۖ فَٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِیدُونَ
english: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan.

arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَـٰهٌ غَیۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا یُشۡرِكُونَ
english: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.

arabic: وَإِن یَرَوۡا۟ كِسۡفࣰا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ سَاقِطࣰا یَقُولُوا۟ سَحَابࣱ مَّرۡكُومࣱ
english: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up."

arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ یُلَـٰقُوا۟ یَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِی فِیهِ یُصۡعَقُونَ
english: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -

arabic: یَوۡمَ لَا یُغۡنِی عَنۡهُمۡ كَیۡدُهُمۡ شَیۡـࣰٔا وَلَا هُمۡ یُنصَرُونَ
english: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped.

arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِینَ ظَلَمُوا۟ عَذَابࣰا دُونَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا یَعۡلَمُونَ
english: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know.

arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡیُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِینَ تَقُومُ
english: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise.

arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّیۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَـٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
english: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلنَّجۡمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ
english: By the star when it descends,

arabic: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمۡ وَمَا غَوَىٰ
english: Your companion [Muhammad] has not strayed, nor has he erred,

arabic: وَمَا یَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰۤ
english: Nor does he speak from [his own] inclination.

arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحۡیࣱ یُوحَىٰ
english: It is not but a revelation revealed,

arabic: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِیدُ ٱلۡقُوَىٰ
english: Taught to him by one intense in strength -

arabic: ذُو مِرَّةࣲ فَٱسۡتَوَىٰ
english: One of soundness. And he rose to [his] true form

arabic: وَهُوَ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
english: While he was in the higher [part of the] horizon.

arabic: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ
english: Then he approached and descended

arabic: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوۡسَیۡنِ أَوۡ أَدۡنَىٰ
english: And was at a distance of two bow lengths or nearer.

arabic: فَأَوۡحَىٰۤ إِلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ مَاۤ أَوۡحَىٰ
english: And he revealed to His Servant what he revealed.

arabic: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلۡفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰۤ
english: The heart did not lie [about] what it saw.

arabic: أَفَتُمَـٰرُونَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَا یَرَىٰ
english: So will you dispute with him over what he saw?

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ نَزۡلَةً أُخۡرَىٰ
english: And he certainly saw him in another descent

arabic: عِندَ سِدۡرَةِ ٱلۡمُنتَهَىٰ
english: At the Lote Tree of the Utmost Boundary -

arabic: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰۤ
english: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -

arabic: إِذۡ یَغۡشَى ٱلسِّدۡرَةَ مَا یَغۡشَىٰ
english: When there covered the Lote Tree that which covered [it].

arabic: مَا زَاغَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ
english: The sight [of the Prophet] did not swerve, nor did it transgress [its limit].

arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَایَـٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰۤ
english: He certainly saw of the greatest signs of his Lord.

arabic: أَفَرَءَیۡتُمُ ٱللَّـٰتَ وَٱلۡعُزَّىٰ
english: So have you considered al-Lat and al-'Uzza?

arabic: وَمَنَوٰةَ ٱلثَّالِثَةَ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰۤ
english: And Manat, the third - the other one?

arabic: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
english: Is the male for you and for Him the female?

arabic: تِلۡكَ إِذࣰا قِسۡمَةࣱ ضِیزَىٰۤ
english: That, then, is an unjust division.

arabic: إِنۡ هِیَ إِلَّاۤ أَسۡمَاۤءࣱ سَمَّیۡتُمُوهَاۤ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَاۤؤُكُم مَّاۤ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلۡطَـٰنٍۚ إِن یَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهۡوَى ٱلۡأَنفُسُۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَاۤءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰۤ
english: They are not but [mere] names you have named them - you and your forefathers - for which Allah has sent down no authority. They follow not except assumption and what [their] souls desire, and there has already come to them from their Lord guidance.

arabic: أَمۡ لِلۡإِنسَـٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ
english: Or is there for man whatever he wishes?

arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةُ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
english: Rather, to Allah belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

arabic: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكࣲ فِی ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ لَا تُغۡنِی شَفَـٰعَتُهُمۡ شَیۡـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن یَأۡذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن یَشَاۤءُ وَیَرۡضَىٰۤ
english: And how many angels there are in the heavens whose intercession will not avail at all except [only] after Allah has permitted [it] to whom He wills and approves.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ لَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ لَیُسَمُّونَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةَ تَسۡمِیَةَ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
english: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter name the angels female names,

arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن یَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا یُغۡنِی مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَیۡـࣰٔا
english: And they have thereof no knowledge. They follow not except assumption, and indeed, assumption avails not against the truth at all.

arabic: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ یُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَیَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡیَا
english: So turn away from whoever turns his back on Our message and desires not except the worldly life.

arabic: ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ مَبۡلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِیلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ
english: That is their sum of knowledge. Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who strays from His way, and He is most knowing of who is guided.

arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِی ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَمَا فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِیَجۡزِیَ ٱلَّذِینَ أَسَـٰۤـُٔوا۟ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَیَجۡزِیَ ٱلَّذِینَ أَحۡسَنُوا۟ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَى
english: And to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth - that He may recompense those who do evil with [the penalty of] what they have done and recompense those who do good with the best [reward] -

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ یَجۡتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰۤىِٕرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡفَوَ ٰ⁠حِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَ ٰ⁠سِعُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِۚ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِكُمۡ إِذۡ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِذۡ أَنتُمۡ أَجِنَّةࣱ فِی بُطُونِ أُمَّهَـٰتِكُمۡۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوۤا۟ أَنفُسَكُمۡۖ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰۤ
english: Those who avoid the major sins and immoralities, only [committing] slight ones. Indeed, your Lord is vast in forgiveness. He was most knowing of you when He produced you from the earth and when you were fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not claim yourselves to be pure; He is most knowing of who fears Him.

arabic: أَفَرَءَیۡتَ ٱلَّذِی تَوَلَّىٰ
english: Have you seen the one who turned away

arabic: وَأَعۡطَىٰ قَلِیلࣰا وَأَكۡدَىٰۤ
english: And gave a little and [then] refrained?

arabic: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡغَیۡبِ فَهُوَ یَرَىٰۤ
english: Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees?

arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ یُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِی صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ
english: Or has he not been informed of what was in the scriptures of Moses

arabic: وَإِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ ٱلَّذِی وَفَّىٰۤ
english: And [of] Abraham, who fulfilled [his obligations] -

arabic: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةࣱ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰ
english: That no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another

arabic: وَأَن لَّیۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَـٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ
english: And that there is not for man except that [good] for which he strives

arabic: وَأَنَّ سَعۡیَهُۥ سَوۡفَ یُرَىٰ
english: And that his effort is going to be seen -

arabic: ثُمَّ یُجۡزَىٰهُ ٱلۡجَزَاۤءَ ٱلۡأَوۡفَىٰ
english: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense

arabic: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡمُنتَهَىٰ
english: And that to your Lord is the finality

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضۡحَكَ وَأَبۡكَىٰ
english: And that it is He who makes [one] laugh and weep

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحۡیَا
english: And that it is He who causes death and gives life

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ خَلَقَ ٱلزَّوۡجَیۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰ
english: And that He creates the two mates - the male and female -

arabic: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ إِذَا تُمۡنَىٰ
english: From a sperm-drop when it is emitted

arabic: وَأَنَّ عَلَیۡهِ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰ
english: And that [incumbent] upon Him is the next creation

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغۡنَىٰ وَأَقۡنَىٰ
english: And that it is He who enriches and suffices

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلشِّعۡرَىٰ
english: And that it is He who is the Lord of Sirius

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥۤ أَهۡلَكَ عَادًا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
english: And that He destroyed the first [people of] 'Aad

arabic: وَثَمُودَا۟ فَمَاۤ أَبۡقَىٰ
english: And Thamud - and He did not spare [them] -

arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحࣲ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ
english: And the people of Noah before. Indeed, it was they who were [even] more unjust and oppressing.

arabic: وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَةَ أَهۡوَىٰ
english: And the overturned towns He hurled down

arabic: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ
english: And covered them by that which He covered.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ
english: Then which of the favors of your Lord do you doubt?

arabic: هَـٰذَا نَذِیرࣱ مِّنَ ٱلنُّذُرِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۤ
english: This [Prophet] is a warner like the former warners.

arabic: أَزِفَتِ ٱلۡـَٔازِفَةُ
english: The Approaching Day has approached.

arabic: لَیۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ
english: Of it, [from those] besides Allah, there is no remover.

arabic: أَفَمِنۡ هَـٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِیثِ تَعۡجَبُونَ
english: Then at this statement do you wonder?

arabic: وَتَضۡحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبۡكُونَ
english: And you laugh and do not weep

arabic: وَأَنتُمۡ سَـٰمِدُونَ
english: While you are proudly sporting?

arabic: فَٱسۡجُدُوا۟ لِلَّهِ وَٱعۡبُدُوا۟ ۩
english: So prostrate to Allah and worship [Him].

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
english: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two].

arabic: وَإِن یَرَوۡا۟ ءَایَةࣰ یُعۡرِضُوا۟ وَیَقُولُوا۟ سِحۡرࣱ مُّسۡتَمِرࣱّ
english: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic."

arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ وَٱتَّبَعُوۤا۟ أَهۡوَاۤءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرࣲ مُّسۡتَقِرࣱّ
english: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَاۤءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَاۤءِ مَا فِیهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ
english: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence -

arabic: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَـٰلِغَةࣱۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
english: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them].

arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ یَوۡمَ یَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَیۡءࣲ نُّكُرٍ
english: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding,

arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَـٰرُهُمۡ یَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادࣱ مُّنتَشِرࣱ
english: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,

arabic: مُّهۡطِعِینَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ یَقُولُ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا یَوۡمٌ عَسِرࣱ
english: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day."

arabic: ۞ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحࣲ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُوا۟ مَجۡنُونࣱ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ
english: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled.

arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥۤ أَنِّی مَغۡلُوبࣱ فَٱنتَصِرۡ
english: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help."

arabic: فَفَتَحۡنَاۤ أَبۡوَ ٰ⁠بَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ بِمَاۤءࣲ مُّنۡهَمِرࣲ
english: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُیُونࣰا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَاۤءُ عَلَىٰۤ أَمۡرࣲ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
english: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined.

arabic: وَحَمَلۡنَـٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡوَ ٰ⁠حࣲ وَدُسُرࣲ
english: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails,

arabic: تَجۡرِی بِأَعۡیُنِنَا جَزَاۤءࣰ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
english: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied.

arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَـٰهَاۤ ءَایَةࣰ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
english: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember?

arabic: فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
english: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادࣱ فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
english: 'Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ رِیحࣰا صَرۡصَرࣰا فِی یَوۡمِ نَحۡسࣲ مُّسۡتَمِرࣲّ
english: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune,

arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلࣲ مُّنقَعِرࣲ
english: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted.

arabic: فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
english: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
english: Thamud denied the warning

arabic: فَقَالُوۤا۟ أَبَشَرࣰا مِّنَّا وَ ٰ⁠حِدࣰا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥۤ إِنَّاۤ إِذࣰا لَّفِی ضَلَـٰلࣲ وَسُعُرٍ
english: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness.

arabic: أَءُلۡقِیَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَیۡهِ مِنۢ بَیۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرࣱ
english: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar."

arabic: سَیَعۡلَمُونَ غَدࣰا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ
english: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar.

arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُوا۟ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةࣰ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
english: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient.

arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَاۤءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَیۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبࣲ مُّحۡتَضَرࣱ
english: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn].

arabic: فَنَادَوۡا۟ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
english: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her].

arabic: فَكَیۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
english: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning.

arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ صَیۡحَةࣰ وَ ٰ⁠حِدَةࣰ فَكَانُوا۟ كَهَشِیمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
english: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطِۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
english: The people of Lot denied the warning.

arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّاۤ ءَالَ لُوطࣲۖ نَّجَّیۡنَـٰهُم بِسَحَرࣲ
english: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

arabic: نِّعۡمَةࣰ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نَجۡزِی مَن شَكَرَ
english: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡا۟ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
english: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَ ٰ⁠وَدُوهُ عَن ضَیۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَاۤ أَعۡیُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
english: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning."

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابࣱ مُّسۡتَقِرࣱّ
english: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment.

arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِی وَنُذُرِ
english: So taste My punishment and warning.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ یَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
english: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَاۤءَ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
english: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning.

arabic: كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِیزࣲ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
english: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability.

arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَیۡرࣱ مِّنۡ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَاۤءَةࣱ فِی ٱلزُّبُرِ
english: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture?

arabic: أَمۡ یَقُولُونَ نَحۡنُ جَمِیعࣱ مُّنتَصِرࣱ
english: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]"?

arabic: سَیُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَیُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
english: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat].

arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
english: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ فِی ضَلَـٰلࣲ وَسُعُرࣲ
english: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness.

arabic: یَوۡمَ یُسۡحَبُونَ فِی ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُوا۟ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
english: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar."

arabic: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَیۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَـٰهُ بِقَدَرࣲ
english: Indeed, all things We created with predestination.

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَمۡرُنَاۤ إِلَّا وَ ٰ⁠حِدَةࣱ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
english: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَاۤ أَشۡیَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرࣲ
english: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember?

arabic: وَكُلُّ شَیۡءࣲ فَعَلُوهُ فِی ٱلزُّبُرِ
english: And everything they did is in written records.

arabic: وَكُلُّ صَغِیرࣲ وَكَبِیرࣲ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ
english: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَنَهَرࣲ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers,

arabic: فِی مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِیكࣲ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
english: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنُ
english: The Most Merciful

arabic: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ
english: Taught the Qur'an,

arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ
english: Created man,

arabic: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلۡبَیَانَ
english: [And] taught him eloquence.

arabic: ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ بِحُسۡبَانࣲ
english: The sun and the moon [move] by precise calculation,

arabic: وَٱلنَّجۡمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ یَسۡجُدَانِ
english: And the stars and trees prostrate.

arabic: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ ٱلۡمِیزَانَ
english: And the heaven He raised and imposed the balance

arabic: أَلَّا تَطۡغَوۡا۟ فِی ٱلۡمِیزَانِ
english: That you not transgress within the balance.

arabic: وَأَقِیمُوا۟ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُوا۟ ٱلۡمِیزَانَ
english: And establish weight in justice and do not make deficient the balance.

arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلۡأَنَامِ
english: And the earth He laid [out] for the creatures.

arabic: فِیهَا فَـٰكِهَةࣱ وَٱلنَّخۡلُ ذَاتُ ٱلۡأَكۡمَامِ
english: Therein is fruit and palm trees having sheaths [of dates]

arabic: وَٱلۡحَبُّ ذُو ٱلۡعَصۡفِ وَٱلرَّیۡحَانُ
english: And grain having husks and scented plants.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَـٰلࣲ كَٱلۡفَخَّارِ
english: He created man from clay like [that of] pottery.

arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱلۡجَاۤنَّ مِن مَّارِجࣲ مِّن نَّارࣲ
english: And He created the jinn from a smokeless flame of fire.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقَیۡنِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَغۡرِبَیۡنِ
english: [He is] Lord of the two sunrises and Lord of the two sunsets.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: مَرَجَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَیۡنِ یَلۡتَقِیَانِ
english: He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];

arabic: بَیۡنَهُمَا بَرۡزَخࣱ لَّا یَبۡغِیَانِ
english: Between them is a barrier [so] neither of them transgresses.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: یَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهُمَا ٱللُّؤۡلُؤُ وَٱلۡمَرۡجَانُ
english: From both of them emerge pearl and coral.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِی ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَـٰمِ
english: And to Him belong the ships [with sails] elevated in the sea like mountains.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: كُلُّ مَنۡ عَلَیۡهَا فَانࣲ
english: Everyone upon the earth will perish,

arabic: وَیَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
english: And there will remain the Face of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: یَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِی ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ یَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِی شَأۡنࣲ
english: Whoever is within the heavens and earth asks Him; every day He is bringing about a matter.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: سَنَفۡرُغُ لَكُمۡ أَیُّهَ ٱلثَّقَلَانِ
english: We will attend to you, O prominent beings.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: یَـٰمَعۡشَرَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُمۡ أَن تَنفُذُوا۟ مِنۡ أَقۡطَارِ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنفُذُوا۟ۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلۡطَـٰنࣲ
english: O company of jinn and mankind, if you are able to pass beyond the regions of the heavens and the earth, then pass. You will not pass except by authority [from Allah].

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: یُرۡسَلُ عَلَیۡكُمَا شُوَاظࣱ مِّن نَّارࣲ وَنُحَاسࣱ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ
english: There will be sent upon you a flame of fire and smoke, and you will not defend yourselves.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةࣰ كَٱلدِّهَانِ
english: And when the heaven is split open and becomes rose-colored like oil -

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

arabic: فَیَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لَّا یُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦۤ إِنسࣱ وَلَا جَاۤنࣱّ
english: Then on that Day none will be asked about his sin among men or jinn.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: یُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِیمَـٰهُمۡ فَیُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَ ٰ⁠صِی وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ
english: The criminals will be known by their marks, and they will be seized by the forelocks and the feet.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: هَـٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِی یُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
english: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.

arabic: یَطُوفُونَ بَیۡنَهَا وَبَیۡنَ حَمِیمٍ ءَانࣲ
english: They will go around between it and scalding water, heated [to the utmost degree].

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: وَلِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ جَنَّتَانِ
english: But for he who has feared the position of his Lord are two gardens -

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

arabic: ذَوَاتَاۤ أَفۡنَانࣲ
english: Having [spreading] branches.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: فِیهِمَا عَیۡنَانِ تَجۡرِیَانِ
english: In both of them are two springs, flowing.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: فِیهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةࣲ زَوۡجَانِ
english: In both of them are of every fruit, two kinds.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔینَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَاۤىِٕنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقࣲۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَیۡنِ دَانࣲ
english: [They are] reclining on beds whose linings are of silk brocade, and the fruit of the two gardens is hanging low.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: فِیهِنَّ قَـٰصِرَ ٰ⁠تُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ یَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسࣱ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَاۤنࣱّ
english: In them are women limiting [their] glances, untouched before them by man or jinni -

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

arabic: كَأَنَّهُنَّ ٱلۡیَاقُوتُ وَٱلۡمَرۡجَانُ
english: As if they were rubies and coral.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: هَلۡ جَزَاۤءُ ٱلۡإِحۡسَـٰنِ إِلَّا ٱلۡإِحۡسَـٰنُ
english: Is the reward for good [anything] but good?

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ
english: And below them both [in excellence] are two [other] gardens -

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

arabic: مُدۡهَاۤمَّتَانِ
english: Dark green [in color].

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: فِیهِمَا عَیۡنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ
english: In both of them are two springs, spouting.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: فِیهِمَا فَـٰكِهَةࣱ وَنَخۡلࣱ وَرُمَّانࣱ
english: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: فِیهِنَّ خَیۡرَ ٰ⁠تٌ حِسَانࣱ
english: In them are good and beautiful women -

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

arabic: حُورࣱ مَّقۡصُورَ ٰ⁠تࣱ فِی ٱلۡخِیَامِ
english: Fair ones reserved in pavilions -

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

arabic: لَمۡ یَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسࣱ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَاۤنࣱّ
english: Untouched before them by man or jinni -

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny? -

arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔینَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرࣲ وَعَبۡقَرِیٍّ حِسَانࣲ
english: Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ ءَالَاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
english: So which of the favors of your Lord would you deny?

arabic: تَبَـٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِی ٱلۡجَلَـٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
english: Blessed is the name of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا وَقَعَتِ ٱلۡوَاقِعَةُ
english: When the Occurrence occurs,

arabic: لَیۡسَ لِوَقۡعَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
english: There is, at its occurrence, no denial.

arabic: خَافِضَةࣱ رَّافِعَةٌ
english: It will bring down [some] and raise up [others].

arabic: إِذَا رُجَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ رَجࣰّا
english: When the earth is shaken with convulsion

arabic: وَبُسَّتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ بَسࣰّا
english: And the mountains are broken down, crumbling

arabic: فَكَانَتۡ هَبَاۤءࣰ مُّنۢبَثࣰّا
english: And become dust dispersing.

arabic: وَكُنتُمۡ أَزۡوَ ٰ⁠جࣰا ثَلَـٰثَةࣰ
english: And you become [of] three kinds:

arabic: فَأَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَیۡمَنَةِ مَاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَیۡمَنَةِ
english: Then the companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

arabic: وَأَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ مَاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
english: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

arabic: وَٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ ٱلسَّـٰبِقُونَ
english: And the forerunners, the forerunners -

arabic: أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
english: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]

arabic: فِی جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِیمِ
english: In the Gardens of Pleasure,

arabic: ثُلَّةࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
english: A [large] company of the former peoples

arabic: وَقَلِیلࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِینَ
english: And a few of the later peoples,

arabic: عَلَىٰ سُرُرࣲ مَّوۡضُونَةࣲ
english: On thrones woven [with ornament],

arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔینَ عَلَیۡهَا مُتَقَـٰبِلِینَ
english: Reclining on them, facing each other.

arabic: یَطُوفُ عَلَیۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَ ٰ⁠نࣱ مُّخَلَّدُونَ
english: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal

arabic: بِأَكۡوَابࣲ وَأَبَارِیقَ وَكَأۡسࣲ مِّن مَّعِینࣲ
english: With vessels, pitchers and a cup [of wine] from a flowing spring -

arabic: لَّا یُصَدَّعُونَ عَنۡهَا وَلَا یُنزِفُونَ
english: No headache will they have therefrom, nor will they be intoxicated -

arabic: وَفَـٰكِهَةࣲ مِّمَّا یَتَخَیَّرُونَ
english: And fruit of what they select

arabic: وَلَحۡمِ طَیۡرࣲ مِّمَّا یَشۡتَهُونَ
english: And the meat of fowl, from whatever they desire.

arabic: وَحُورٌ عِینࣱ
english: And [for them are] fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes,

arabic: كَأَمۡثَـٰلِ ٱللُّؤۡلُوِٕ ٱلۡمَكۡنُونِ
english: The likenesses of pearls well-protected,

arabic: جَزَاۤءَۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ یَعۡمَلُونَ
english: As reward for what they used to do.

arabic: لَا یَسۡمَعُونَ فِیهَا لَغۡوࣰا وَلَا تَأۡثِیمًا
english: They will not hear therein ill speech or commission of sin -

arabic: إِلَّا قِیلࣰا سَلَـٰمࣰا سَلَـٰمࣰا
english: Only a saying: "Peace, peace."

arabic: وَأَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡیَمِینِ مَاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡیَمِینِ
english: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?

arabic: فِی سِدۡرࣲ مَّخۡضُودࣲ
english: [They will be] among lote trees with thorns removed

arabic: وَطَلۡحࣲ مَّنضُودࣲ
english: And [banana] trees layered [with fruit]

arabic: وَظِلࣲّ مَّمۡدُودࣲ
english: And shade extended

arabic: وَمَاۤءࣲ مَّسۡكُوبࣲ
english: And water poured out

arabic: وَفَـٰكِهَةࣲ كَثِیرَةࣲ
english: And fruit, abundant [and varied],

arabic: لَّا مَقۡطُوعَةࣲ وَلَا مَمۡنُوعَةࣲ
english: Neither limited [to season] nor forbidden,

arabic: وَفُرُشࣲ مَّرۡفُوعَةٍ
english: And [upon] beds raised high.

arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَنشَأۡنَـٰهُنَّ إِنشَاۤءࣰ
english: Indeed, We have produced the women of Paradise in a [new] creation

arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَـٰهُنَّ أَبۡكَارًا
english: And made them virgins,

arabic: عُرُبًا أَتۡرَابࣰا
english: Devoted [to their husbands] and of equal age,

arabic: لِّأَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلۡیَمِینِ
english: For the companions of the right [who are]

arabic: ثُلَّةࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
english: A company of the former peoples

arabic: وَثُلَّةࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِینَ
english: And a company of the later peoples.

arabic: وَأَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ مَاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلشِّمَالِ
english: And the companions of the left - what are the companions of the left?

arabic: فِی سَمُومࣲ وَحَمِیمࣲ
english: [They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water

arabic: وَظِلࣲّ مِّن یَحۡمُومࣲ
english: And a shade of black smoke,

arabic: لَّا بَارِدࣲ وَلَا كَرِیمٍ
english: Neither cool nor beneficial.

arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ قَبۡلَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ مُتۡرَفِینَ
english: Indeed they were, before that, indulging in affluence,

arabic: وَكَانُوا۟ یُصِرُّونَ عَلَى ٱلۡحِنثِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
english: And they used to persist in the great violation,

arabic: وَكَانُوا۟ یَقُولُونَ أَىِٕذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابࣰا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ
english: And they used to say, "When we die and become dust and bones, are we indeed to be resurrected?

arabic: أَوَءَابَاۤؤُنَا ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ
english: And our forefathers [as well]?"

arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ وَٱلۡـَٔاخِرِینَ
english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, the former and the later peoples

arabic: لَمَجۡمُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِیقَـٰتِ یَوۡمࣲ مَّعۡلُومࣲ
english: Are to be gathered together for the appointment of a known Day."

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ أَیُّهَا ٱلضَّاۤلُّونَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبُونَ
english: Then indeed you, O those astray [who are] deniers,

arabic: لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِن شَجَرࣲ مِّن زَقُّومࣲ
english: Will be eating from trees of zaqqum

arabic: فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ
english: And filling with it your bellies

arabic: فَشَـٰرِبُونَ عَلَیۡهِ مِنَ ٱلۡحَمِیمِ
english: And drinking on top of it from scalding water

arabic: فَشَـٰرِبُونَ شُرۡبَ ٱلۡهِیمِ
english: And will drink as the drinking of thirsty camels.

arabic: هَـٰذَا نُزُلُهُمۡ یَوۡمَ ٱلدِّینِ
english: That is their accommodation on the Day of Recompense.

arabic: نَحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَـٰكُمۡ فَلَوۡلَا تُصَدِّقُونَ
english: We have created you, so why do you not believe?

arabic: أَفَرَءَیۡتُم مَّا تُمۡنُونَ
english: Have you seen that which you emit?

arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ تَخۡلُقُونَهُۥۤ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡخَـٰلِقُونَ
english: Is it you who creates it, or are We the Creator?

arabic: نَحۡنُ قَدَّرۡنَا بَیۡنَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِینَ
english: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone

arabic: عَلَىٰۤ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَـٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِی مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
english: In that We will change your likenesses and produce you in that [form] which you do not know.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُمُ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ فَلَوۡلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
english: And you have already known the first creation, so will you not remember?

arabic: أَفَرَءَیۡتُم مَّا تَحۡرُثُونَ
english: And have you seen that [seed] which you sow?

arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ تَزۡرَعُونَهُۥۤ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلزَّ ٰ⁠رِعُونَ
english: Is it you who makes it grow, or are We the grower?

arabic: لَوۡ نَشَاۤءُ لَجَعَلۡنَـٰهُ حُطَـٰمࣰا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ
english: If We willed, We could make it [dry] debris, and you would remain in wonder,

arabic: إِنَّا لَمُغۡرَمُونَ
english: [Saying], "Indeed, we are [now] in debt;

arabic: بَلۡ نَحۡنُ مَحۡرُومُونَ
english: Rather, we have been deprived."

arabic: أَفَرَءَیۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَاۤءَ ٱلَّذِی تَشۡرَبُونَ
english: And have you seen the water that you drink?

arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنزَلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنزِلُونَ
english: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds, or is it We who bring it down?

arabic: لَوۡ نَشَاۤءُ جَعَلۡنَـٰهُ أُجَاجࣰا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ
english: If We willed, We could make it bitter, so why are you not grateful?

arabic: أَفَرَءَیۡتُمُ ٱلنَّارَ ٱلَّتِی تُورُونَ
english: And have you seen the fire that you ignite?

arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَاۤ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ
english: Is it you who produced its tree, or are We the producer?

arabic: نَحۡنُ جَعَلۡنَـٰهَا تَذۡكِرَةࣰ وَمَتَـٰعࣰا لِّلۡمُقۡوِینَ
english: We have made it a reminder and provision for the travelers,

arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
english: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

arabic: ۞ فَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِمَوَ ٰ⁠قِعِ ٱلنُّجُومِ
english: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,

arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَقَسَمࣱ لَّوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عَظِیمٌ
english: And indeed, it is an oath - if you could know - [most] great.

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقُرۡءَانࣱ كَرِیمࣱ
english: Indeed, it is a noble Qur'an

arabic: فِی كِتَـٰبࣲ مَّكۡنُونࣲ
english: In a Register well-protected;

arabic: لَّا یَمَسُّهُۥۤ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُطَهَّرُونَ
english: None touch it except the purified.

arabic: تَنزِیلࣱ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
english: [It is] a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.

arabic: أَفَبِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِیثِ أَنتُم مُّدۡهِنُونَ
english: Then is it to this statement that you are indifferent

arabic: وَتَجۡعَلُونَ رِزۡقَكُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ
english: And make [the thanks for] your provision that you deny [the Provider]?

arabic: فَلَوۡلَاۤ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلۡحُلۡقُومَ
english: Then why, when the soul at death reaches the throat

arabic: وَأَنتُمۡ حِینَىِٕذࣲ تَنظُرُونَ
english: And you are at that time looking on -

arabic: وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَیۡهِ مِنكُمۡ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبۡصِرُونَ
english: And Our angels are nearer to him than you, but you do not see -

arabic: فَلَوۡلَاۤ إِن كُنتُمۡ غَیۡرَ مَدِینِینَ
english: Then why do you not, if you are not to be recompensed,

arabic: تَرۡجِعُونَهَاۤ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَـٰدِقِینَ
english: Bring it back, if you should be truthful?

arabic: فَأَمَّاۤ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِینَ
english: And if the deceased was of those brought near to Allah,

arabic: فَرَوۡحࣱ وَرَیۡحَانࣱ وَجَنَّتُ نَعِیمࣲ
english: Then [for him is] rest and bounty and a garden of pleasure.

arabic: وَأَمَّاۤ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلۡیَمِینِ
english: And if he was of the companions of the right,

arabic: فَسَلَـٰمࣱ لَّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَـٰبِ ٱلۡیَمِینِ
english: Then [the angels will say], "Peace for you; [you are] from the companions of the right."

arabic: وَأَمَّاۤ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ ٱلضَّاۤلِّینَ
english: But if he was of the deniers [who were] astray,

arabic: فَنُزُلࣱ مِّنۡ حَمِیمࣲ
english: Then [for him is] accommodation of scalding water

arabic: وَتَصۡلِیَةُ جَحِیمٍ
english: And burning in Hellfire

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ ٱلۡیَقِینِ
english: Indeed, this is the true certainty,

arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
english: So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِی ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِیزُ ٱلۡحَكِیمُ
english: Whatever is in the heavens and earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

arabic: لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ یُحۡیِۦ وَیُمِیتُۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ قَدِیرٌ
english: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things competent.

arabic: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡـَٔاخِرُ وَٱلظَّـٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَیۡءٍ عَلِیمٌ
english: He is the First and the Last, the Ascendant and the Intimate, and He is, of all things, Knowing.

arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فِی سِتَّةِ أَیَّامࣲ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡعَرۡشِۖ یَعۡلَمُ مَا یَلِجُ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا یَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا یَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَمَا یَعۡرُجُ فِیهَاۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمۡ أَیۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِیرࣱ
english: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.

arabic: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
english: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.

arabic: یُولِجُ ٱلَّیۡلَ فِی ٱلنَّهَارِ وَیُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِی ٱلَّیۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِیمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
english: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts.

arabic: ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَأَنفِقُوا۟ مِمَّا جَعَلَكُم مُّسۡتَخۡلَفِینَ فِیهِۖ فَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنكُمۡ وَأَنفَقُوا۟ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرࣱ كَبِیرࣱ
english: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward.

arabic: وَمَا لَكُمۡ لَا تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلرَّسُولُ یَدۡعُوكُمۡ لِتُؤۡمِنُوا۟ بِرَبِّكُمۡ وَقَدۡ أَخَذَ مِیثَـٰقَكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِینَ
english: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers?

arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِی یُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦۤ ءَایَـٰتِۭ بَیِّنَـٰتࣲ لِّیُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنَ ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ إِلَى ٱلنُّورِۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُوفࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ
english: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful.

arabic: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تُنفِقُوا۟ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِیرَ ٰ⁠ثُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَا یَسۡتَوِی مِنكُم مَّنۡ أَنفَقَ مِن قَبۡلِ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ وَقَـٰتَلَۚ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةࣰ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِینَ أَنفَقُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعۡدُ وَقَـٰتَلُوا۟ۚ وَكُلࣰّا وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِیرࣱ
english: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted.

arabic: مَّن ذَا ٱلَّذِی یُقۡرِضُ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنࣰا فَیُضَـٰعِفَهُۥ لَهُۥ وَلَهُۥۤ أَجۡرࣱ كَرِیمࣱ
english: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward?

arabic: یَوۡمَ تَرَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتِ یَسۡعَىٰ نُورُهُم بَیۡنَ أَیۡدِیهِمۡ وَبِأَیۡمَـٰنِهِمۖ بُشۡرَىٰكُمُ ٱلۡیَوۡمَ جَنَّـٰتࣱ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِیمُ
english: On the Day you see the believing men and believing women, their light proceeding before them and on their right, [it will be said], "Your good tidings today are [of] gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein you will abide eternally." That is what is the great attainment.

arabic: یَوۡمَ یَقُولُ ٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقُونَ وَٱلۡمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتُ لِلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱنظُرُونَا نَقۡتَبِسۡ مِن نُّورِكُمۡ قِیلَ ٱرۡجِعُوا۟ وَرَاۤءَكُمۡ فَٱلۡتَمِسُوا۟ نُورࣰاۖ فَضُرِبَ بَیۡنَهُم بِسُورࣲ لَّهُۥ بَابُۢ بَاطِنُهُۥ فِیهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَةُ وَظَـٰهِرُهُۥ مِن قِبَلِهِ ٱلۡعَذَابُ
english: On the [same] Day the hypocrite men and hypocrite women will say to those who believed, "Wait for us that we may acquire some of your light." It will be said, "Go back behind you and seek light." And a wall will be placed between them with a door, its interior containing mercy, but on the outside of it is torment.

arabic: یُنَادُونَهُمۡ أَلَمۡ نَكُن مَّعَكُمۡۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّكُمۡ فَتَنتُمۡ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَتَرَبَّصۡتُمۡ وَٱرۡتَبۡتُمۡ وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ ٱلۡأَمَانِیُّ حَتَّىٰ جَاۤءَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَغَرَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ
english: The hypocrites will call to the believers, "Were we not with you?" They will say, "Yes, but you afflicted yourselves and awaited [misfortune for us] and doubted, and wishful thinking deluded you until there came the command of Allah. And the Deceiver deceived you concerning Allah.

arabic: فَٱلۡیَوۡمَ لَا یُؤۡخَذُ مِنكُمۡ فِدۡیَةࣱ وَلَا مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ۚ مَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ هِیَ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِیرُ
english: So today no ransom will be taken from you or from those who disbelieved. Your refuge is the Fire. It is most worthy of you, and wretched is the destination.

arabic: ۞ أَلَمۡ یَأۡنِ لِلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوۤا۟ أَن تَخۡشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡ لِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَا یَكُونُوا۟ كَٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَطَالَ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡأَمَدُ فَقَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡۖ وَكَثِیرࣱ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَـٰسِقُونَ
english: Has the time not come for those who have believed that their hearts should become humbly submissive at the remembrance of Allah and what has come down of the truth? And let them not be like those who were given the Scripture before, and a long period passed over them, so their hearts hardened; and many of them are defiantly disobedient.

arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ یُحۡیِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَیَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡـَٔایَـٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
english: Know that Allah gives life to the earth after its lifelessness. We have made clear to you the signs; perhaps you will understand.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُصَّدِّقِینَ وَٱلۡمُصَّدِّقَـٰتِ وَأَقۡرَضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنࣰا یُضَـٰعَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرࣱ كَرِیمࣱ
english: Indeed, the men who practice charity and the women who practice charity and [they who] have loaned Allah a goodly loan - it will be multiplied for them, and they will have a noble reward.

arabic: وَٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦۤ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلصِّدِّیقُونَۖ وَٱلشُّهَدَاۤءُ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ وَنُورُهُمۡۖ وَٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَاۤ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِیمِ
english: And those who have believed in Allah and His messengers - those are [in the ranks of] the supporters of truth and the martyrs, with their Lord. For them is their reward and their light. But those who have disbelieved and denied Our verses - those are the companions of Hellfire.

arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوۤا۟ أَنَّمَا ٱلۡحَیَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡیَا لَعِبࣱ وَلَهۡوࣱ وَزِینَةࣱ وَتَفَاخُرُۢ بَیۡنَكُمۡ وَتَكَاثُرࣱ فِی ٱلۡأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لِ وَٱلۡأَوۡلَـٰدِۖ كَمَثَلِ غَیۡثٍ أَعۡجَبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَبَاتُهُۥ ثُمَّ یَهِیجُ فَتَرَىٰهُ مُصۡفَرࣰّا ثُمَّ یَكُونُ حُطَـٰمࣰاۖ وَفِی ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ عَذَابࣱ شَدِیدࣱ وَمَغۡفِرَةࣱ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَ ٰ⁠نࣱۚ وَمَا ٱلۡحَیَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡیَاۤ إِلَّا مَتَـٰعُ ٱلۡغُرُورِ
english: Know that the life of this world is but amusement and diversion and adornment and boasting to one another and competition in increase of wealth and children - like the example of a rain whose [resulting] plant growth pleases the tillers; then it dries and you see it turned yellow; then it becomes [scattered] debris. And in the Hereafter is severe punishment and forgiveness from Allah and approval. And what is the worldly life except the enjoyment of delusion.

arabic: سَابِقُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةࣲ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا كَعَرۡضِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرُسُلِهِۦۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ یُؤۡتِیهِ مَن یَشَاۤءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
english: Race toward forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden whose width is like the width of the heavens and earth, prepared for those who believed in Allah and His messengers. That is the bounty of Allah which He gives to whom He wills, and Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

arabic: مَاۤ أَصَابَ مِن مُّصِیبَةࣲ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِیۤ أَنفُسِكُمۡ إِلَّا فِی كِتَـٰبࣲ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن نَّبۡرَأَهَاۤۚ إِنَّ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ یَسِیرࣱ
english: No disaster strikes upon the earth or among yourselves except that it is in a register before We bring it into being - indeed that, for Allah, is easy -

arabic: لِّكَیۡلَا تَأۡسَوۡا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَفۡرَحُوا۟ بِمَاۤ ءَاتَىٰكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا یُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَالࣲ فَخُورٍ
english: In order that you not despair over what has eluded you and not exult [in pride] over what He has given you. And Allah does not like everyone self-deluded and boastful -

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ یَبۡخَلُونَ وَیَأۡمُرُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ بِٱلۡبُخۡلِۗ وَمَن یَتَوَلَّ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِیُّ ٱلۡحَمِیدُ
english: [Those] who are stingy and enjoin upon people stinginess. And whoever turns away - then indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.

arabic: لَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا بِٱلۡبَیِّنَـٰتِ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلۡمِیزَانَ لِیَقُومَ ٱلنَّاسُ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِۖ وَأَنزَلۡنَا ٱلۡحَدِیدَ فِیهِ بَأۡسࣱ شَدِیدࣱ وَمَنَـٰفِعُ لِلنَّاسِ وَلِیَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ مَن یَنصُرُهُۥ وَرُسُلَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَیۡبِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِیٌّ عَزِیزࣱ
english: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحࣰا وَإِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِی ذُرِّیَّتِهِمَا ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلۡكِتَـٰبَۖ فَمِنۡهُم مُّهۡتَدࣲۖ وَكَثِیرࣱ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَـٰسِقُونَ
english: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

arabic: ثُمَّ قَفَّیۡنَا عَلَىٰۤ ءَاثَـٰرِهِم بِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّیۡنَا بِعِیسَى ٱبۡنِ مَرۡیَمَ وَءَاتَیۡنَـٰهُ ٱلۡإِنجِیلَۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِی قُلُوبِ ٱلَّذِینَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ رَأۡفَةࣰ وَرَحۡمَةࣰۚ وَرَهۡبَانِیَّةً ٱبۡتَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَبۡنَـٰهَا عَلَیۡهِمۡ إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَاۤءَ رِضۡوَ ٰ⁠نِ ٱللَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوۡهَا حَقَّ رِعَایَتِهَاۖ فَـَٔاتَیۡنَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنۡهُمۡ أَجۡرَهُمۡۖ وَكَثِیرࣱ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَـٰسِقُونَ
english: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

arabic: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَءَامِنُوا۟ بِرَسُولِهِۦ یُؤۡتِكُمۡ كِفۡلَیۡنِ مِن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَیَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ نُورࣰا تَمۡشُونَ بِهِۦ وَیَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمࣱ
english: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

arabic: لِّئَلَّا یَعۡلَمَ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبِ أَلَّا یَقۡدِرُونَ عَلَىٰ شَیۡءࣲ مِّن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنَّ ٱلۡفَضۡلَ بِیَدِ ٱللَّهِ یُؤۡتِیهِ مَن یَشَاۤءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
english: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ قَدۡ سَمِعَ ٱللَّهُ قَوۡلَ ٱلَّتِی تُجَـٰدِلُكَ فِی زَوۡجِهَا وَتَشۡتَكِیۤ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ یَسۡمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُمَاۤۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِیعُۢ بَصِیرٌ
english: Certainly has Allah heard the speech of the one who argues with you, [O Muhammad], concerning her husband and directs her complaint to Allah. And Allah hears your dialogue; indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ یُظَـٰهِرُونَ مِنكُم مِّن نِّسَاۤىِٕهِم مَّا هُنَّ أُمَّهَـٰتِهِمۡۖ إِنۡ أُمَّهَـٰتُهُمۡ إِلَّا ٱلَّـٰۤـِٔی وَلَدۡنَهُمۡۚ وَإِنَّهُمۡ لَیَقُولُونَ مُنكَرࣰا مِّنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَزُورࣰاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورࣱ
english: Those who pronounce thihar among you [to separate] from their wives - they are not [consequently] their mothers. Their mothers are none but those who gave birth to them. And indeed, they are saying an objectionable statement and a falsehood. But indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.

arabic: وَٱلَّذِینَ یُظَـٰهِرُونَ مِن نِّسَاۤىِٕهِمۡ ثُمَّ یَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُوا۟ فَتَحۡرِیرُ رَقَبَةࣲ مِّن قَبۡلِ أَن یَتَمَاۤسَّاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكُمۡ تُوعَظُونَ بِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِیرࣱ
english: And those who pronounce thihar from their wives and then [wish to] go back on what they said - then [there must be] the freeing of a slave before they touch one another. That is what you are admonished thereby; and Allah is Acquainted with what you do.

arabic: فَمَن لَّمۡ یَجِدۡ فَصِیَامُ شَهۡرَیۡنِ مُتَتَابِعَیۡنِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن یَتَمَاۤسَّاۖ فَمَن لَّمۡ یَسۡتَطِعۡ فَإِطۡعَامُ سِتِّینَ مِسۡكِینࣰاۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ لِتُؤۡمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۚ وَتِلۡكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِۗ وَلِلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ عَذَابٌ أَلِیمٌ
english: And he who does not find [a slave] - then a fast for two months consecutively before they touch one another; and he who is unable - then the feeding of sixty poor persons. That is for you to believe [completely] in Allah and His Messenger; and those are the limits [set by] Allah. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ یُحَاۤدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ كُبِتُوا۟ كَمَا كُبِتَ ٱلَّذِینَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ وَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَاۤ ءَایَـٰتِۭ بَیِّنَـٰتࣲۚ وَلِلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ عَذَابࣱ مُّهِینࣱ
english: Indeed, those who oppose Allah and His Messenger are abased as those before them were abased. And We have certainly sent down verses of clear evidence. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.

arabic: یَوۡمَ یَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِیعࣰا فَیُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوۤا۟ۚ أَحۡصَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ وَنَسُوهُۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ شَهِیدٌ
english: On the Day when Allah will resurrect them all and inform them of what they did. Allah had enumerated it, while they forgot it; and Allah is, over all things, Witness.

arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ یَعۡلَمُ مَا فِی ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَمَا فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ مَا یَكُونُ مِن نَّجۡوَىٰ ثَلَـٰثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمۡ وَلَا خَمۡسَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ سَادِسُهُمۡ وَلَاۤ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ وَلَاۤ أَكۡثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمۡ أَیۡنَ مَا كَانُوا۟ۖ ثُمَّ یُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَیۡءٍ عَلِیمٌ
english: Have you not considered that Allah knows what is in the heavens and what is on the earth? There is in no private conversation three but that He is the fourth of them, nor are there five but that He is the sixth of them - and no less than that and no more except that He is with them [in knowledge] wherever they are. Then He will inform them of what they did, on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.

arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِینَ نُهُوا۟ عَنِ ٱلنَّجۡوَىٰ ثُمَّ یَعُودُونَ لِمَا نُهُوا۟ عَنۡهُ وَیَتَنَـٰجَوۡنَ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَ ٰ⁠نِ وَمَعۡصِیَتِ ٱلرَّسُولِۖ وَإِذَا جَاۤءُوكَ حَیَّوۡكَ بِمَا لَمۡ یُحَیِّكَ بِهِ ٱللَّهُ وَیَقُولُونَ فِیۤ أَنفُسِهِمۡ لَوۡلَا یُعَذِّبُنَا ٱللَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُۚ حَسۡبُهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ یَصۡلَوۡنَهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِیرُ
english: Have you not considered those who were forbidden from private conversation, then they return to that which they were forbidden and converse among themselves about sin and aggression and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you, they greet you with that [word] by which Allah does not greet you and say among themselves, "Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?" Sufficient for them is Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the destination.
