english: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّی دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارࣰا
english: Then I invited them publicly.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّیۤ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارࣰا
english: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارࣰا
english: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

arabic: یُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءَ عَلَیۡكُم مِّدۡرَارࣰا
english: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

arabic: وَیُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لࣲ وَبَنِینَ وَیَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَیَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَـٰرࣰا
english: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارࣰا
english: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

arabic: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا
english: While He has created you in stages?

arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡا۟ كَیۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تࣲ طِبَاقࣰا
english: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِیهِنَّ نُورࣰا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجࣰا
english: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتࣰا
english: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

arabic: ثُمَّ یُعِیدُكُمۡ فِیهَا وَیُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجࣰا
english: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطࣰا
english: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

arabic: لِّتَسۡلُكُوا۟ مِنۡهَا سُبُلࣰا فِجَاجࣰا
english: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

arabic: قَالَ نُوحࣱ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِی وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمۡ یَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥۤ إِلَّا خَسَارࣰا
english: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكۡرࣰا كُبَّارࣰا
english: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدࣰّا وَلَا سُوَاعࣰا وَلَا یَغُوثَ وَیَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرࣰا
english: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِیرࣰاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلࣰا
english: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِیۤـَٔـٰتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُوا۟ فَأُدۡخِلُوا۟ نَارࣰا فَلَمۡ یَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارࣰا
english: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحࣱ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ دَیَّارًا
english: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ یُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا یَلِدُوۤا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرࣰا كَفَّارࣰا
english: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِی وَلِوَ ٰ⁠لِدَیَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَیۡتِیَ مُؤۡمِنࣰا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
english: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ قُلۡ أُوحِیَ إِلَیَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبࣰا
english: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an.

arabic: یَهۡدِیۤ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَاۤ أَحَدࣰا
english: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone.

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَـٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَـٰحِبَةࣰ وَلَا وَلَدࣰا
english: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ یَقُولُ سَفِیهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطࣰا
english: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression.

arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّاۤ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبࣰا
english: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie.

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالࣱ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ یَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالࣲ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقࣰا
english: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden.

arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّوا۟ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن یَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدࣰا
english: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger].

arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءَ فَوَجَدۡنَـٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسࣰا شَدِیدࣰا وَشُهُبࣰا
english: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames.

arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَـٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن یَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡـَٔانَ یَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابࣰا رَّصَدࣰا
english: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him.

arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِیۤ أَشَرٌّ أُرِیدَ بِمَن فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدࣰا
english: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course.

arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَاۤىِٕقَ قِدَدࣰا
english: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways.

arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّاۤ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبࣰا
english: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.

arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰۤ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن یُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا یَخَافُ بَخۡسࣰا وَلَا رَهَقࣰا
english: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden.

arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَـٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ تَحَرَّوۡا۟ رَشَدࣰا
english: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course.

arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡقَـٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُوا۟ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبࣰا
english: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood.'

arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَـٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِیقَةِ لَأَسۡقَیۡنَـٰهُم مَّاۤءً غَدَقࣰا
english: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

arabic: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِیهِۚ وَمَن یُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ یَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابࣰا صَعَدࣰا
english: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment.

arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَـٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدࣰا
english: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone.

arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ یَدۡعُوهُ كَادُوا۟ یَكُونُونَ عَلَیۡهِ لِبَدࣰا
english: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass."

arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَاۤ أَدۡعُوا۟ رَبِّی وَلَاۤ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦۤ أَحَدࣰا
english: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."

arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّی لَاۤ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرࣰّا وَلَا رَشَدࣰا
english: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction."

arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّی لَن یُجِیرَنِی مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدࣱ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا
english: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.

arabic: إِلَّا بَلَـٰغࣰا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَـٰلَـٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن یَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَـٰلِدِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَبَدًا
english: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.

arabic: حَتَّىٰۤ إِذَا رَأَوۡا۟ مَا یُوعَدُونَ فَسَیَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرࣰا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدࣰا
english: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.

arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِیۤ أَقَرِیبࣱ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ یَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّیۤ أَمَدًا
english: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."

arabic: عَـٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَیۡبِ فَلَا یُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَیۡبِهِۦۤ أَحَدًا
english: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولࣲ فَإِنَّهُۥ یَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَیۡنِ یَدَیۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدࣰا
english: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

arabic: لِّیَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُوا۟ رِسَـٰلَـٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَیۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَیۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا
english: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡمُزَّمِّلُ
english: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],

arabic: قُمِ ٱلَّیۡلَ إِلَّا قَلِیلࣰا
english: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -

arabic: نِّصۡفَهُۥۤ أَوِ ٱنقُصۡ مِنۡهُ قَلِیلًا
english: Half of it - or subtract from it a little

arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَیۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِیلًا
english: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.

arabic: إِنَّا سَنُلۡقِی عَلَیۡكَ قَوۡلࣰا ثَقِیلًا
english: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.

arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّیۡلِ هِیَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـࣰٔا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِیلًا
english: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.

arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِی ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحࣰا طَوِیلࣰا
english: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.

arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَیۡهِ تَبۡتِیلࣰا
english: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.

arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَاۤ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِیلࣰا
english: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.

arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا یَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرࣰا جَمِیلࣰا
english: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.

arabic: وَذَرۡنِی وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ أُو۟لِی ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِیلًا
english: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.

arabic: إِنَّ لَدَیۡنَاۤ أَنكَالࣰا وَجَحِیمࣰا
english: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire

arabic: وَطَعَامࣰا ذَا غُصَّةࣲ وَعَذَابًا أَلِیمࣰا
english: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -

arabic: یَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِیبࣰا مَّهِیلًا
english: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.

arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَاۤ إِلَیۡكُمۡ رَسُولࣰا شَـٰهِدًا عَلَیۡكُمۡ كَمَاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَاۤ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولࣰا
english: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.

arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَـٰهُ أَخۡذࣰا وَبِیلࣰا
english: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.

arabic: فَكَیۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ یَوۡمࣰا یَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَ ٰ⁠نَ شِیبًا
english: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?

arabic: ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا
english: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةࣱۖ فَمَن شَاۤءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِیلًا
english: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.

arabic: ۞ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ یَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَیِ ٱلَّیۡلِ وَنِصۡفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَاۤىِٕفَةࣱ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِینَ مَعَكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ یُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّیۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحۡصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَیۡكُمۡۖ فَٱقۡرَءُوا۟ مَا تَیَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَیَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرۡضَىٰ وَءَاخَرُونَ یَضۡرِبُونَ فِی ٱلۡأَرۡضِ یَبۡتَغُونَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَءَاخَرُونَ یُقَـٰتِلُونَ فِی سَبِیلِ ٱللَّهِۖ فَٱقۡرَءُوا۟ مَا تَیَسَّرَ مِنۡهُۚ وَأَقِیمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقۡرِضُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنࣰاۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَیۡرࣲ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَیۡرࣰا وَأَعۡظَمَ أَجۡرࣰاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورࣱ رَّحِیمُۢ
english: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡمُدَّثِّرُ
english: O you who covers himself [with a garment],

arabic: قُمۡ فَأَنذِرۡ
english: Arise and warn

arabic: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرۡ
english: And your Lord glorify

arabic: وَثِیَابَكَ فَطَهِّرۡ
english: And your clothing purify

arabic: وَٱلرُّجۡزَ فَٱهۡجُرۡ
english: And uncleanliness avoid

arabic: وَلَا تَمۡنُن تَسۡتَكۡثِرُ
english: And do not confer favor to acquire more

arabic: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصۡبِرۡ
english: But for your Lord be patient.

arabic: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِی ٱلنَّاقُورِ
english: And when the trumpet is blown,

arabic: فَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ یَوۡمٌ عَسِیرٌ
english: That Day will be a difficult day

arabic: عَلَى ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ غَیۡرُ یَسِیرࣲ
english: For the disbelievers - not easy.

arabic: ذَرۡنِی وَمَنۡ خَلَقۡتُ وَحِیدࣰا
english: Leave Me with the one I created alone

arabic: وَجَعَلۡتُ لَهُۥ مَالࣰا مَّمۡدُودࣰا
english: And to whom I granted extensive wealth

arabic: وَبَنِینَ شُهُودࣰا
english: And children present [with him]

arabic: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمۡهِیدࣰا
english: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].

arabic: ثُمَّ یَطۡمَعُ أَنۡ أَزِیدَ
english: Then he desires that I should add more.

arabic: كَلَّاۤۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا عَنِیدࣰا
english: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.

arabic: سَأُرۡهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا
english: I will cover him with arduous torment.

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
english: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.

arabic: فَقُتِلَ كَیۡفَ قَدَّرَ
english: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

arabic: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَیۡفَ قَدَّرَ
english: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.

arabic: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
english: Then he considered [again];

arabic: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
english: Then he frowned and scowled;

arabic: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ
english: Then he turned back and was arrogant

arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَـٰذَاۤ إِلَّا سِحۡرࣱ یُؤۡثَرُ
english: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].

arabic: إِنۡ هَـٰذَاۤ إِلَّا قَوۡلُ ٱلۡبَشَرِ
english: This is not but the word of a human being."

arabic: سَأُصۡلِیهِ سَقَرَ
english: I will drive him into Saqar.

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ
english: And what can make you know what is Saqar?

arabic: لَا تُبۡقِی وَلَا تَذَرُ
english: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],

arabic: لَوَّاحَةࣱ لِّلۡبَشَرِ
english: Blackening the skins.

arabic: عَلَیۡهَا تِسۡعَةَ عَشَرَ
english: Over it are nineteen [angels].

arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةࣰۖ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا عِدَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةࣰ لِّلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِیَسۡتَیۡقِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ وَیَزۡدَادَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوۤا۟ إِیمَـٰنࣰا وَلَا یَرۡتَابَ ٱلَّذِینَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلۡكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَلِیَقُولَ ٱلَّذِینَ فِی قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضࣱ وَٱلۡكَـٰفِرُونَ مَاذَاۤ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلࣰاۚ كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ یُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن یَشَاۤءُ وَیَهۡدِی مَن یَشَاۤءُۚ وَمَا یَعۡلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَمَا هِیَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡبَشَرِ
english: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.

arabic: كَلَّا وَٱلۡقَمَرِ
english: No! By the moon

arabic: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذۡ أَدۡبَرَ
english: And [by] the night when it departs

arabic: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَاۤ أَسۡفَرَ
english: And [by] the morning when it brightens,

arabic: إِنَّهَا لَإِحۡدَى ٱلۡكُبَرِ
english: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]

arabic: نَذِیرࣰا لِّلۡبَشَرِ
english: As a warning to humanity -

arabic: لِمَن شَاۤءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن یَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ یَتَأَخَّرَ
english: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.

arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ رَهِینَةٌ
english: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained

arabic: إِلَّاۤ أَصۡحَـٰبَ ٱلۡیَمِینِ
english: Except the companions of the right,

arabic: فِی جَنَّـٰتࣲ یَتَسَاۤءَلُونَ
english: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other

arabic: عَنِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ
english: About the criminals,

arabic: مَا سَلَكَكُمۡ فِی سَقَرَ
english: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"

arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَمۡ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصَلِّینَ
english: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,

arabic: وَلَمۡ نَكُ نُطۡعِمُ ٱلۡمِسۡكِینَ
english: Nor did we used to feed the poor.

arabic: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلۡخَاۤىِٕضِینَ
english: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],

arabic: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِیَوۡمِ ٱلدِّینِ
english: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense

arabic: حَتَّىٰۤ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلۡیَقِینُ
english: Until there came to us the certainty."

arabic: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمۡ شَفَـٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِینَ
english: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.

arabic: فَمَا لَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلتَّذۡكِرَةِ مُعۡرِضِینَ
english: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away

arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ حُمُرࣱ مُّسۡتَنفِرَةࣱ
english: As if they were alarmed donkeys

arabic: فَرَّتۡ مِن قَسۡوَرَةِۭ
english: Fleeing from a lion?

arabic: بَلۡ یُرِیدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِئࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن یُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفࣰا مُّنَشَّرَةࣰ
english: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.

arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا یَخَافُونَ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةَ
english: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.

arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّهُۥ تَذۡكِرَةࣱ
english: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder

arabic: فَمَن شَاۤءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
english: Then whoever wills will remember it.

arabic: وَمَا یَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّاۤ أَن یَشَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ
english: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ لَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِیَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ
english: I swear by the Day of Resurrection

arabic: وَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلنَّفۡسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ
english: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].

arabic: أَیَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجۡمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ
english: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?

arabic: بَلَىٰ قَـٰدِرِینَ عَلَىٰۤ أَن نُّسَوِّیَ بَنَانَهُۥ
english: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.

arabic: بَلۡ یُرِیدُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ لِیَفۡجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ
english: But man desires to continue in sin.

arabic: یَسۡـَٔلُ أَیَّانَ یَوۡمُ ٱلۡقِیَـٰمَةِ
english: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

arabic: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ
english: So when vision is dazzled

arabic: وَخَسَفَ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
english: And the moon darkens

arabic: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ
english: And the sun and the moon are joined,

arabic: یَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ یَوۡمَىِٕذٍ أَیۡنَ ٱلۡمَفَرُّ
english: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"

arabic: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
english: No! There is no refuge.

arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ یَوۡمَىِٕذٍ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقَرُّ
english: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.

arabic: یُنَبَّؤُا۟ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ یَوۡمَىِٕذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
english: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.

arabic: بَلِ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦ بَصِیرَةࣱ
english: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,

arabic: وَلَوۡ أَلۡقَىٰ مَعَاذِیرَهُۥ
english: Even if he presents his excuses.

arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦۤ
english: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.

arabic: إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا جَمۡعَهُۥ وَقُرۡءَانَهُۥ
english: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.

arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡنَـٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعۡ قُرۡءَانَهُۥ
english: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا بَیَانَهُۥ
english: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].

arabic: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ
english: No! But you love the immediate

arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةَ
english: And leave the Hereafter.

arabic: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ نَّاضِرَةٌ
english: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,

arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةࣱ
english: Looking at their Lord.

arabic: وَوُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذِۭ بَاسِرَةࣱ
english: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,

arabic: تَظُنُّ أَن یُفۡعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةࣱ
english: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.

arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِیَ
english: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones

arabic: وَقِیلَ مَنۡۜ رَاقࣲ
english: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"

arabic: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡفِرَاقُ
english: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation

arabic: وَٱلۡتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ
english: And the leg is wound about the leg,

arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ یَوۡمَىِٕذٍ ٱلۡمَسَاقُ
english: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.

arabic: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
english: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.

arabic: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
english: But [instead], he denied and turned away.

arabic: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ یَتَمَطَّىٰۤ
english: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].

arabic: أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰ
english: Woe to you, and woe!

arabic: ثُمَّ أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰۤ
english: Then woe to you, and woe!

arabic: أَیَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ أَن یُتۡرَكَ سُدًى
english: Does man think that he will be left neglected?

arabic: أَلَمۡ یَكُ نُطۡفَةࣰ مِّن مَّنِیࣲّ یُمۡنَىٰ
english: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?

arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةࣰ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
english: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]

arabic: فَجَعَلَ مِنۡهُ ٱلزَّوۡجَیۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰۤ
english: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.

arabic: أَلَیۡسَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰۤ أَن یُحۡـِۧیَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ
english: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنِ حِینࣱ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ یَكُن شَیۡـࣰٔا مَّذۡكُورًا
english: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?

arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجࣲ نَّبۡتَلِیهِ فَجَعَلۡنَـٰهُ سَمِیعَۢا بَصِیرًا
english: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.

arabic: إِنَّا هَدَیۡنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِیلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرࣰا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
english: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.

arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغۡلَـٰلࣰا وَسَعِیرًا
english: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ یَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسࣲ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
english: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,

arabic: عَیۡنࣰا یَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ یُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِیرࣰا
english: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].

arabic: یُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَیَخَافُونَ یَوۡمࣰا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِیرࣰا
english: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.

arabic: وَیُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِینࣰا وَیَتِیمࣰا وَأَسِیرًا
english: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,

arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِیدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَاۤءࣰ وَلَا شُكُورًا
english: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.

arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا یَوۡمًا عَبُوسࣰا قَمۡطَرِیرࣰا
english: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."

arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡیَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةࣰ وَسُرُورࣰا
english: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness

arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةࣰ وَحَرِیرࣰا
english: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].

arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔینَ فِیهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَاۤىِٕكِۖ لَا یَرَوۡنَ فِیهَا شَمۡسࣰا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِیرࣰا
english: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.

arabic: وَدَانِیَةً عَلَیۡهِمۡ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِیلࣰا
english: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.

arabic: وَیُطَافُ عَلَیۡهِم بِـَٔانِیَةࣲ مِّن فِضَّةࣲ وَأَكۡوَابࣲ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِیرَا۠
english: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],

arabic: قَوَارِیرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةࣲ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِیرࣰا
english: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.

arabic: وَیُسۡقَوۡنَ فِیهَا كَأۡسࣰا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِیلًا
english: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger

arabic: عَیۡنࣰا فِیهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِیلࣰا
english: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.

arabic: ۞ وَیَطُوفُ عَلَیۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَ ٰ⁠نࣱ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَیۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤࣰا مَّنثُورࣰا
english: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.

arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَیۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَیۡتَ نَعِیمࣰا وَمُلۡكࣰا كَبِیرًا
english: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.

arabic: عَـٰلِیَهُمۡ ثِیَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرࣱ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقࣱۖ وَحُلُّوۤا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةࣲ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابࣰا طَهُورًا
english: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَاۤءࣰ وَكَانَ سَعۡیُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا
english: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."

arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَیۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِیلࣰا
english: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.

arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورࣰا
english: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].

arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةࣰ وَأَصِیلࣰا
english: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening

arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّیۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَیۡلࣰا طَوِیلًا
english: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ یُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَیَذَرُونَ وَرَاۤءَهُمۡ یَوۡمࣰا ثَقِیلࣰا
english: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.

arabic: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَـٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَاۤ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَاۤ أَمۡثَـٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِیلًا
english: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةࣱۖ فَمَن شَاۤءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِیلࣰا
english: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.

arabic: وَمَا تَشَاۤءُونَ إِلَّاۤ أَن یَشَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِیمًا حَكِیمࣰا
english: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.

arabic: یُدۡخِلُ مَن یَشَاۤءُ فِی رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِیمَۢا
english: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلۡمُرۡسَلَـٰتِ عُرۡفࣰا
english: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts

arabic: فَٱلۡعَـٰصِفَـٰتِ عَصۡفࣰا
english: And the winds that blow violently

arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَ ٰ⁠تِ نَشۡرࣰا
english: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]

arabic: فَٱلۡفَـٰرِقَـٰتِ فَرۡقࣰا
english: And those [angels] who bring criterion

arabic: فَٱلۡمُلۡقِیَـٰتِ ذِكۡرًا
english: And those [angels] who deliver a message

arabic: عُذۡرًا أَوۡ نُذۡرًا
english: As justification or warning,

arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَ ٰ⁠قِعࣱ
english: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.

arabic: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتۡ
english: So when the stars are obliterated

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ فُرِجَتۡ
english: And when the heaven is opened

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ نُسِفَتۡ
english: And when the mountains are blown away

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتۡ
english: And when the messengers' time has come...

arabic: لِأَیِّ یَوۡمٍ أُجِّلَتۡ
english: For what Day was it postponed?

arabic: لِیَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
english: For the Day of Judgement.

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ
english: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: أَلَمۡ نُهۡلِكِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
english: Did We not destroy the former peoples?

arabic: ثُمَّ نُتۡبِعُهُمُ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرِینَ
english: Then We will follow them with the later ones.

arabic: كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِٱلۡمُجۡرِمِینَ
english: Thus do We deal with the criminals.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: أَلَمۡ نَخۡلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاۤءࣲ مَّهِینࣲ
english: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?

arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَـٰهُ فِی قَرَارࣲ مَّكِینٍ
english: And We placed it in a firm lodging

arabic: إِلَىٰ قَدَرࣲ مَّعۡلُومࣲ
english: For a known extent.

arabic: فَقَدَرۡنَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡقَـٰدِرُونَ
english: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ كِفَاتًا
english: Have We not made the earth a container

arabic: أَحۡیَاۤءࣰ وَأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠تࣰا
english: Of the living and the dead?

arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِیهَا رَوَ ٰ⁠سِیَ شَـٰمِخَـٰتࣲ وَأَسۡقَیۡنَـٰكُم مَّاۤءࣰ فُرَاتࣰا
english: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
english: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.

arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلࣲّ ذِی ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبࣲ
english: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns

arabic: لَّا ظَلِیلࣲ وَلَا یُغۡنِی مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
english: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."

arabic: إِنَّهَا تَرۡمِی بِشَرَرࣲ كَٱلۡقَصۡرِ
english: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,

arabic: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَـٰلَتࣱ صُفۡرࣱ
english: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: هَـٰذَا یَوۡمُ لَا یَنطِقُونَ
english: This is a Day they will not speak,

arabic: وَلَا یُؤۡذَنُ لَهُمۡ فَیَعۡتَذِرُونَ
english: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: هَـٰذَا یَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِۖ جَمَعۡنَـٰكُمۡ وَٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
english: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.

arabic: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمۡ كَیۡدࣱ فَكِیدُونِ
english: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِینَ فِی ظِلَـٰلࣲ وَعُیُونࣲ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs

arabic: وَفَوَ ٰ⁠كِهَ مِمَّا یَشۡتَهُونَ
english: And fruits from whatever they desire,

arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشۡرَبُوا۟ هَنِیۤـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
english: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."

arabic: إِنَّا كَذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ نَجۡزِی ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِینَ
english: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: كُلُوا۟ وَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ قَلِیلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجۡرِمُونَ
english: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: وَإِذَا قِیلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُوا۟ لَا یَرۡكَعُونَ
english: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.

arabic: فَبِأَیِّ حَدِیثِۭ بَعۡدَهُۥ یُؤۡمِنُونَ
english: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ عَمَّ یَتَسَاۤءَلُونَ
english: About what are they asking one another?

arabic: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلۡعَظِیمِ
english: About the great news -

arabic: ٱلَّذِی هُمۡ فِیهِ مُخۡتَلِفُونَ
english: That over which they are in disagreement.

arabic: كَلَّا سَیَعۡلَمُونَ
english: No! They are going to know.

arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَیَعۡلَمُونَ
english: Then, no! They are going to know.

arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِهَـٰدࣰا
english: Have We not made the earth a resting place?

arabic: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَوۡتَادࣰا
english: And the mountains as stakes?

arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَـٰكُمۡ أَزۡوَ ٰ⁠جࣰا
english: And We created you in pairs

arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا نَوۡمَكُمۡ سُبَاتࣰا
english: And made your sleep [a means for] rest

arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّیۡلَ لِبَاسࣰا
english: And made the night as clothing

arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشࣰا
english: And made the day for livelihood

arabic: وَبَنَیۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعࣰا شِدَادࣰا
english: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]

arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا سِرَاجࣰا وَهَّاجࣰا
english: And made [therein] a burning lamp

arabic: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُعۡصِرَ ٰ⁠تِ مَاۤءࣰ ثَجَّاجࣰا
english: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water

arabic: لِّنُخۡرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبࣰّا وَنَبَاتࣰا
english: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation

arabic: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلۡفَافًا
english: And gardens of entwined growth.

arabic: إِنَّ یَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ كَانَ مِیقَـٰتࣰا
english: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -

arabic: یَوۡمَ یُنفَخُ فِی ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجࣰا
english: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes

arabic: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ فَكَانَتۡ أَبۡوَ ٰ⁠بࣰا
english: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways

arabic: وَسُیِّرَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ فَكَانَتۡ سَرَابًا
english: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.

arabic: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتۡ مِرۡصَادࣰا
english: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait

arabic: لِّلطَّـٰغِینَ مَـَٔابࣰا
english: For the transgressors, a place of return,

arabic: لَّـٰبِثِینَ فِیهَاۤ أَحۡقَابࣰا
english: In which they will remain for ages [unending].

arabic: لَّا یَذُوقُونَ فِیهَا بَرۡدࣰا وَلَا شَرَابًا
english: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink

arabic: إِلَّا حَمِیمࣰا وَغَسَّاقࣰا
english: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -

arabic: جَزَاۤءࣰ وِفَاقًا
english: An appropriate recompense.

arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوا۟ لَا یَرۡجُونَ حِسَابࣰا
english: Indeed, they were not expecting an account

arabic: وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا كِذَّابࣰا
english: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.

arabic: وَكُلَّ شَیۡءٍ أَحۡصَیۡنَـٰهُ كِتَـٰبࣰا
english: But all things We have enumerated in writing.

arabic: فَذُوقُوا۟ فَلَن نَّزِیدَكُمۡ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
english: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."

arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِینَ مَفَازًا
english: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -

arabic: حَدَاۤىِٕقَ وَأَعۡنَـٰبࣰا
english: Gardens and grapevines

arabic: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتۡرَابࣰا
english: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age

arabic: وَكَأۡسࣰا دِهَاقࣰا
english: And a full cup.

arabic: لَّا یَسۡمَعُونَ فِیهَا لَغۡوࣰا وَلَا كِذَّ ٰ⁠بࣰا
english: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -

arabic: جَزَاۤءࣰ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاۤءً حِسَابࣰا
english: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,

arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَیۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِۖ لَا یَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابࣰا
english: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.

arabic: یَوۡمَ یَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةُ صَفࣰّاۖ لَّا یَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابࣰا
english: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.

arabic: ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡیَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَاۤءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
english: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.

arabic: إِنَّاۤ أَنذَرۡنَـٰكُمۡ عَذَابࣰا قَرِیبࣰا یَوۡمَ یَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ یَدَاهُ وَیَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ یَـٰلَیۡتَنِی كُنتُ تُرَ ٰ⁠بَۢا
english: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَـٰتِ غَرۡقࣰا
english: By those [angels] who extract with violence

arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَـٰتِ نَشۡطࣰا
english: And [by] those who remove with ease

arabic: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَـٰتِ سَبۡحࣰا
english: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming

arabic: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَـٰتِ سَبۡقࣰا
english: And those who race each other in a race

arabic: فَٱلۡمُدَبِّرَ ٰ⁠تِ أَمۡرࣰا
english: And those who arrange [each] matter,

arabic: یَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ
english: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],

arabic: تَتۡبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ
english: There will follow it the subsequent [one].

arabic: قُلُوبࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ وَاجِفَةٌ
english: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,

arabic: أَبۡصَـٰرُهَا خَـٰشِعَةࣱ
english: Their eyes humbled.

arabic: یَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرۡدُودُونَ فِی ٱلۡحَافِرَةِ
english: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?

arabic: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَـٰمࣰا نَّخِرَةࣰ
english: Even if we should be decayed bones?

arabic: قَالُوا۟ تِلۡكَ إِذࣰا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةࣱ
english: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."

arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِیَ زَجۡرَةࣱ وَ ٰ⁠حِدَةࣱ
english: Indeed, it will be but one shout,

arabic: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ
english: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.

arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ مُوسَىٰۤ
english: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -

arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
english: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,

arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ
english: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.

arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰۤ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
english: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself

arabic: وَأَهۡدِیَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخۡشَىٰ
english: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"

arabic: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلۡـَٔایَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
english: And he showed him the greatest sign,

arabic: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
english: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.

arabic: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ یَسۡعَىٰ
english: Then he turned his back, striving.

arabic: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
english: And he gathered [his people] and called out

arabic: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
english: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."

arabic: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةِ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰۤ
english: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].

arabic: إِنَّ فِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ لَعِبۡرَةࣰ لِّمَن یَخۡشَىٰۤ
english: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].

arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا
english: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.

arabic: رَفَعَ سَمۡكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا
english: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.

arabic: وَأَغۡطَشَ لَیۡلَهَا وَأَخۡرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا
english: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.

arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ دَحَىٰهَاۤ
english: And after that He spread the earth.

arabic: أَخۡرَجَ مِنۡهَا مَاۤءَهَا وَمَرۡعَىٰهَا
english: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,

arabic: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَرۡسَىٰهَا
english: And the mountains He set firmly

arabic: مَتَـٰعࣰا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَـٰمِكُمۡ
english: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.

arabic: فَإِذَا جَاۤءَتِ ٱلطَّاۤمَّةُ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
english: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -

arabic: یَوۡمَ یَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ
english: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,

arabic: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلۡجَحِیمُ لِمَن یَرَىٰ
english: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -

arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
english: So as for he who transgressed

arabic: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلۡحَیَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡیَا
english: And preferred the life of the world,

arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَحِیمَ هِیَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
english: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.

arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ
english: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,

arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ هِیَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ
english: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.

arabic: یَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَیَّانَ مُرۡسَىٰهَا
english: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?

arabic: فِیمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكۡرَىٰهَاۤ
english: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?

arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَاۤ
english: To your Lord is its finality.

arabic: إِنَّمَاۤ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن یَخۡشَىٰهَا
english: You are only a warner for those who fear it.

arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ یَوۡمَ یَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ یَلۡبَثُوۤا۟ إِلَّا عَشِیَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا
english: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰۤ
english: The Prophet frowned and turned away

arabic: أَن جَاۤءَهُ ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ
english: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

arabic: وَمَا یُدۡرِیكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ یَزَّكَّىٰۤ
english: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified

arabic: أَوۡ یَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰۤ
english: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

arabic: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
english: As for he who thinks himself without need,

arabic: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ
english: To him you give attention.

arabic: وَمَا عَلَیۡكَ أَلَّا یَزَّكَّىٰ
english: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

arabic: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاۤءَكَ یَسۡعَىٰ
english: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

arabic: وَهُوَ یَخۡشَىٰ
english: While he fears [Allah],

arabic: فَأَنتَ عَنۡهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
english: From him you are distracted.

arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّهَا تَذۡكِرَةࣱ
english: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;

arabic: فَمَن شَاۤءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ
english: So whoever wills may remember it.

arabic: فِی صُحُفࣲ مُّكَرَّمَةࣲ
english: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,

arabic: مَّرۡفُوعَةࣲ مُّطَهَّرَةِۭ
english: Exalted and purified,

arabic: بِأَیۡدِی سَفَرَةࣲ
english: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,

arabic: كِرَامِۭ بَرَرَةࣲ
english: Noble and dutiful.

arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَاۤ أَكۡفَرَهُۥ
english: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.

arabic: مِنۡ أَیِّ شَیۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ
english: From what substance did He create him?

arabic: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ
english: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

arabic: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِیلَ یَسَّرَهُۥ
english: Then He eased the way for him;

arabic: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقۡبَرَهُۥ
english: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاۤءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ
english: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

arabic: كَلَّا لَمَّا یَقۡضِ مَاۤ أَمَرَهُۥ
english: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

arabic: فَلۡیَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦۤ
english: Then let mankind look at his food -

arabic: أَنَّا صَبَبۡنَا ٱلۡمَاۤءَ صَبࣰّا
english: How We poured down water in torrents,

arabic: ثُمَّ شَقَقۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ شَقࣰّا
english: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

arabic: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِیهَا حَبࣰّا
english: And caused to grow within it grain

arabic: وَعِنَبࣰا وَقَضۡبࣰا
english: And grapes and herbage

arabic: وَزَیۡتُونࣰا وَنَخۡلࣰا
english: And olive and palm trees

arabic: وَحَدَاۤىِٕقَ غُلۡبࣰا
english: And gardens of dense shrubbery

arabic: وَفَـٰكِهَةࣰ وَأَبࣰّا
english: And fruit and grass -

arabic: مَّتَـٰعࣰا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَـٰمِكُمۡ
english: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.

arabic: فَإِذَا جَاۤءَتِ ٱلصَّاۤخَّةُ
english: But when there comes the Deafening Blast

arabic: یَوۡمَ یَفِرُّ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِیهِ
english: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

arabic: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِیهِ
english: And his mother and his father

arabic: وَصَـٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِیهِ
english: And his wife and his children,

arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِئࣲ مِّنۡهُمۡ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ شَأۡنࣱ یُغۡنِیهِ
english: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

arabic: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ مُّسۡفِرَةࣱ
english: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -

arabic: ضَاحِكَةࣱ مُّسۡتَبۡشِرَةࣱ
english: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

arabic: وَوُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذٍ عَلَیۡهَا غَبَرَةࣱ
english: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

arabic: تَرۡهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
english: Blackness will cover them.

arabic: أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَفَرَةُ ٱلۡفَجَرَةُ
english: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ كُوِّرَتۡ
english: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتۡ
english: And when the stars fall, dispersing,

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ سُیِّرَتۡ
english: And when the mountains are removed

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتۡ
english: And when full-term she-camels are neglected

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتۡ
english: And when the wild beasts are gathered

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتۡ
english: And when the seas are filled with flame

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتۡ
english: And when the souls are paired

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡمَوۡءُۥدَةُ سُىِٕلَتۡ
english: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked

arabic: بِأَیِّ ذَنۢبࣲ قُتِلَتۡ
english: For what sin she was killed

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتۡ
english: And when the pages are made public

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ كُشِطَتۡ
english: And when the sky is stripped away

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَحِیمُ سُعِّرَتۡ
english: And when Hellfire is set ablaze

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَنَّةُ أُزۡلِفَتۡ
english: And when Paradise is brought near,

arabic: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسࣱ مَّاۤ أَحۡضَرَتۡ
english: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].

arabic: فَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلۡخُنَّسِ
english: So I swear by the retreating stars -

arabic: ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡكُنَّسِ
english: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -

arabic: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا عَسۡعَسَ
english: And by the night as it closes in

arabic: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
english: And by the dawn when it breathes

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولࣲ كَرِیمࣲ
english: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger

arabic: ذِی قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِی ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِینࣲ
english: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],

arabic: مُّطَاعࣲ ثَمَّ أَمِینࣲ
english: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.

arabic: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجۡنُونࣲ
english: And your companion is not [at all] mad.

arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡمُبِینِ
english: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.

arabic: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلۡغَیۡبِ بِضَنِینࣲ
english: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.

arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَیۡطَـٰنࣲ رَّجِیمࣲ
english: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].

arabic: فَأَیۡنَ تَذۡهَبُونَ
english: So where are you going?

arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرࣱ لِّلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
english: It is not except a reminder to the worlds

arabic: لِمَن شَاۤءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن یَسۡتَقِیمَ
english: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.

arabic: وَمَا تَشَاۤءُونَ إِلَّاۤ أَن یَشَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
english: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنفَطَرَتۡ
english: When the sky breaks apart

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتۡ
english: And when the stars fall, scattering,

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتۡ
english: And when the seas are erupted

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡقُبُورُ بُعۡثِرَتۡ
english: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,

arabic: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسࣱ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ
english: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.

arabic: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِیمِ
english: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,

arabic: ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
english: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?

arabic: فِیۤ أَیِّ صُورَةࣲ مَّا شَاۤءَ رَكَّبَكَ
english: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.

arabic: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّینِ
english: No! But you deny the Recompense.

arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَیۡكُمۡ لَحَـٰفِظِینَ
english: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,

arabic: كِرَامࣰا كَـٰتِبِینَ
english: Noble and recording;

arabic: یَعۡلَمُونَ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ
english: They know whatever you do.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِی نَعِیمࣲ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,

arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلۡفُجَّارَ لَفِی جَحِیمࣲ
english: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.

arabic: یَصۡلَوۡنَهَا یَوۡمَ ٱلدِّینِ
english: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,

arabic: وَمَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا بِغَاۤىِٕبِینَ
english: And never therefrom will they be absent.

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ
english: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

arabic: ثُمَّ مَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا یَوۡمُ ٱلدِّینِ
english: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?

arabic: یَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسࣱ لِّنَفۡسࣲ شَیۡـࣰٔاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلَّهِ
english: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَیۡلࣱ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِینَ
english: Woe to those who give less [than due],

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ یَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
english: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.

arabic: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ یُخۡسِرُونَ
english: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.

arabic: أَلَا یَظُنُّ أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ
english: Do they not think that they will be resurrected

arabic: لِیَوۡمٍ عَظِیمࣲ
english: For a tremendous Day -

arabic: یَوۡمَ یَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَـٰلَمِینَ
english: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?

arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِی سِجِّینࣲ
english: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّینࣱ
english: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?

arabic: كِتَـٰبࣱ مَّرۡقُومࣱ
english: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.

arabic: وَیۡلࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِینَ
english: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ یُكَذِّبُونَ بِیَوۡمِ ٱلدِّینِ
english: Who deny the Day of Recompense.

arabic: وَمَا یُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦۤ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِیمٍ
english: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.

arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَیۡهِ ءَایَـٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَـٰطِیرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِینَ
english: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."

arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ یَكۡسِبُونَ
english: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.

arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
english: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُوا۟ ٱلۡجَحِیمِ
english: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.

arabic: ثُمَّ یُقَالُ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِی كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
english: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."

arabic: كَلَّاۤ إِنَّ كِتَـٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِی عِلِّیِّینَ
english: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّیُّونَ
english: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?

arabic: كِتَـٰبࣱ مَّرۡقُومࣱ
english: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed

arabic: یَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
english: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِی نَعِیمٍ
english: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure

arabic: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَاۤىِٕكِ یَنظُرُونَ
english: On adorned couches, observing.

arabic: تَعۡرِفُ فِی وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِیمِ
english: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.

arabic: یُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِیقࣲ مَّخۡتُومٍ
english: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.

arabic: خِتَـٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكࣱۚ وَفِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ فَلۡیَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَـٰفِسُونَ
english: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.

arabic: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِیمٍ
english: And its mixture is of Tasneem,

arabic: عَیۡنࣰا یَشۡرَبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ
english: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ أَجۡرَمُوا۟ كَانُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ یَضۡحَكُونَ
english: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.

arabic: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا۟ بِهِمۡ یَتَغَامَزُونَ
english: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوۤا۟ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُوا۟ فَكِهِینَ
english: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.

arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوۤا۟ إِنَّ هَـٰۤؤُلَاۤءِ لَضَاۤلُّونَ
english: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."

arabic: وَمَاۤ أُرۡسِلُوا۟ عَلَیۡهِمۡ حَـٰفِظِینَ
english: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.

arabic: فَٱلۡیَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ یَضۡحَكُونَ
english: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,

arabic: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَاۤىِٕكِ یَنظُرُونَ
english: On adorned couches, observing.

arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا۟ یَفۡعَلُونَ
english: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِذَا ٱلسَّمَاۤءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ
english: When the sky has split [open]

arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
english: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ
english: And when the earth has been extended

arabic: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِیهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ
english: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ
english: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -

arabic: یَـٰۤأَیُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحࣰا فَمُلَـٰقِیهِ
english: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ بِیَمِینِهِۦ
english: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

arabic: فَسَوۡفَ یُحَاسَبُ حِسَابࣰا یَسِیرࣰا
english: He will be judged with an easy account

arabic: وَیَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورࣰا
english: And return to his people in happiness.

arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِیَ كِتَـٰبَهُۥ وَرَاۤءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ
english: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

arabic: فَسَوۡفَ یَدۡعُوا۟ ثُبُورࣰا
english: He will cry out for destruction

arabic: وَیَصۡلَىٰ سَعِیرًا
english: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِیۤ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا
english: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن یَحُورَ
english: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

arabic: بَلَىٰۤۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِیرࣰا
english: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

arabic: فَلَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ
english: So I swear by the twilight glow

arabic: وَٱلَّیۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
english: And [by] the night and what it envelops

arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ
english: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

arabic: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقࣲ
english: [That] you will surely experience state after state.

arabic: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا یُؤۡمِنُونَ
english: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَیۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا یَسۡجُدُونَ ۩
english: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ یُكَذِّبُونَ
english: But those who have disbelieved deny,

arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا یُوعُونَ
english: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

arabic: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِیمٍ
english: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَیۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ
english: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ
english: By the sky containing great stars

arabic: وَٱلۡیَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ
english: And [by] the promised Day

arabic: وَشَاهِدࣲ وَمَشۡهُودࣲ
english: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

arabic: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ
english: Cursed were the companions of the trench

arabic: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ
english: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,

arabic: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَیۡهَا قُعُودࣱ
english: When they were sitting near it

arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا یَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ شُهُودࣱ
english: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّاۤ أَن یُؤۡمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِیزِ ٱلۡحَمِیدِ
english: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

arabic: ٱلَّذِی لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَیۡءࣲ شَهِیدٌ
english: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ یَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِیقِ
english: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣱ تَجۡرِی مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَـٰرُۚ ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِیرُ
english: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

arabic: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِیدٌ
english: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ یُبۡدِئُ وَیُعِیدُ
english: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ
english: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

arabic: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِیدُ
english: Honorable Owner of the Throne,

arabic: فَعَّالࣱ لِّمَا یُرِیدُ
english: Effecter of what He intends.

arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ
english: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

arabic: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ
english: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?

arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِی تَكۡذِیبࣲ
english: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

arabic: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَاۤىِٕهِم مُّحِیطُۢ
english: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانࣱ مَّجِیدࣱ
english: But this is an honored Qur'an

arabic: فِی لَوۡحࣲ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ
english: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ
english: By the sky and the night comer -

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ
english: And what can make you know what is the night comer?

arabic: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ
english: It is the piercing star -

arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسࣲ لَّمَّا عَلَیۡهَا حَافِظࣱ
english: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.

arabic: فَلۡیَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
english: So let man observe from what he was created.

arabic: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاۤءࣲ دَافِقࣲ
english: He was created from a fluid, ejected,

arabic: یَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَیۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَاۤىِٕبِ
english: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرࣱ
english: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.

arabic: یَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَاۤىِٕرُ
english: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,

arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةࣲ وَلَا نَاصِرࣲ
english: Then man will have no power or any helper.

arabic: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ
english: By the sky which returns [rain]

arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ
english: And [by] the earth which cracks open,

arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلࣱ فَصۡلࣱ
english: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,

arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ
english: And it is not amusement.

arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ یَكِیدُونَ كَیۡدࣰا
english: Indeed, they are planning a plan,

arabic: وَأَكِیدُ كَیۡدࣰا
english: But I am planning a plan.

arabic: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَیۡدَۢا
english: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى
english: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,

arabic: ٱلَّذِی خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
english: Who created and proportioned

arabic: وَٱلَّذِی قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
english: And who destined and [then] guided

arabic: وَٱلَّذِیۤ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ
english: And who brings out the pasture

arabic: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَاۤءً أَحۡوَىٰ
english: And [then] makes it black stubble.

arabic: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰۤ
english: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,

arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَاۤءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ یَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا یَخۡفَىٰ
english: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.

arabic: وَنُیَسِّرُكَ لِلۡیُسۡرَىٰ
english: And We will ease you toward ease.

arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
english: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;

arabic: سَیَذَّكَّرُ مَن یَخۡشَىٰ
english: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.

arabic: وَیَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
english: But the wretched one will avoid it -

arabic: ٱلَّذِی یَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ
english: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,

arabic: ثُمَّ لَا یَمُوتُ فِیهَا وَلَا یَحۡیَىٰ
english: Neither dying therein nor living.

arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
english: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself

arabic: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ
english: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.

arabic: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَیَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡیَا
english: But you prefer the worldly life,

arabic: وَٱلۡـَٔاخِرَةُ خَیۡرࣱ وَأَبۡقَىٰۤ
english: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِی ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
english: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,

arabic: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَ ٰ⁠هِیمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
english: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِیثُ ٱلۡغَـٰشِیَةِ
english: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?

arabic: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذٍ خَـٰشِعَةٌ
english: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,

arabic: عَامِلَةࣱ نَّاصِبَةࣱ
english: Working [hard] and exhausted.

arabic: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِیَةࣰ
english: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.

arabic: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَیۡنٍ ءَانِیَةࣲ
english: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.

arabic: لَّیۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِیعࣲ
english: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant

arabic: لَّا یُسۡمِنُ وَلَا یُغۡنِی مِن جُوعࣲ
english: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.

arabic: وُجُوهࣱ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ نَّاعِمَةࣱ
english: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.

arabic: لِّسَعۡیِهَا رَاضِیَةࣱ
english: With their effort [they are] satisfied

arabic: فِی جَنَّةٍ عَالِیَةࣲ
english: In an elevated garden,

arabic: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِیهَا لَـٰغِیَةࣰ
english: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.

arabic: فِیهَا عَیۡنࣱ جَارِیَةࣱ
english: Within it is a flowing spring.

arabic: فِیهَا سُرُرࣱ مَّرۡفُوعَةࣱ
english: Within it are couches raised high

arabic: وَأَكۡوَابࣱ مَّوۡضُوعَةࣱ
english: And cups put in place

arabic: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةࣱ
english: And cushions lined up

arabic: وَزَرَابِیُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ
english: And carpets spread around.

arabic: أَفَلَا یَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَیۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ
english: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?

arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَاۤءِ كَیۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ
english: And at the sky - how it is raised?

arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَیۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ
english: And at the mountains - how they are erected?

arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَیۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ
english: And at the earth - how it is spread out?

arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَاۤ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرࣱ
english: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.

arabic: لَّسۡتَ عَلَیۡهِم بِمُصَیۡطِرٍ
english: You are not over them a controller.

arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
english: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -

arabic: فَیُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ
english: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.

arabic: إِنَّ إِلَیۡنَاۤ إِیَابَهُمۡ
english: Indeed, to Us is their return.

arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا حِسَابَهُم
english: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ
english: By the dawn

arabic: وَلَیَالٍ عَشۡرࣲ
english: And [by] ten nights

arabic: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ
english: And [by] the even [number] and the odd

arabic: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا یَسۡرِ
english: And [by] the night when it passes,

arabic: هَلۡ فِی ذَ ٰ⁠لِكَ قَسَمࣱ لِّذِی حِجۡرٍ
english: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَیۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
english: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -

arabic: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ
english: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,

arabic: ٱلَّتِی لَمۡ یُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِی ٱلۡبِلَـٰدِ
english: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?

arabic: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِینَ جَابُوا۟ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ
english: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?

arabic: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِی ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ
english: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -

arabic: ٱلَّذِینَ طَغَوۡا۟ فِی ٱلۡبِلَـٰدِ
english: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands

arabic: فَأَكۡثَرُوا۟ فِیهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ
english: And increased therein the corruption.

arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَیۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ
english: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.

arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ
english: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.

arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَیَقُولُ رَبِّیۤ أَكۡرَمَنِ
english: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."

arabic: وَأَمَّاۤ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَیۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَیَقُولُ رَبِّیۤ أَهَـٰنَنِ
english: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."

arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡیَتِیمَ
english: No! But you do not honor the orphan

arabic: وَلَا تَحَـٰۤضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِینِ
english: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.

arabic: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلࣰا لَّمࣰّا
english: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,

arabic: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبࣰّا جَمࣰّا
english: And you love wealth with immense love.

arabic: كَلَّاۤۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكࣰّا دَكࣰّا
english: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -

arabic: وَجَاۤءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفࣰّا صَفࣰّا
english: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,

arabic: وَجِا۟یۤءَ یَوۡمَىِٕذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ یَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ یَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ
english: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?

arabic: یَقُولُ یَـٰلَیۡتَنِی قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَیَاتِی
english: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."

arabic: فَیَوۡمَىِٕذࣲ لَّا یُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥۤ أَحَدࣱ
english: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,

arabic: وَلَا یُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥۤ أَحَدࣱ
english: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].

arabic: یَـٰۤأَیَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَىِٕنَّةُ
english: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,

arabic: ٱرۡجِعِیۤ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِیَةࣰ مَّرۡضِیَّةࣰ
english: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],

arabic: فَٱدۡخُلِی فِی عِبَـٰدِی
english: And enter among My [righteous] servants

arabic: وَٱدۡخُلِی جَنَّتِی
english: And enter My Paradise."

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ لَاۤ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
english: I swear by this city, Makkah -

arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ
english: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -

arabic: وَوَالِدࣲ وَمَا وَلَدَ
english: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],

arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَـٰنَ فِی كَبَدٍ
english: We have certainly created man into hardship.

arabic: أَیَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن یَقۡدِرَ عَلَیۡهِ أَحَدࣱ
english: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?

arabic: یَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالࣰا لُّبَدًا
english: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."

arabic: أَیَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ یَرَهُۥۤ أَحَدٌ
english: Does he think that no one has seen him?

arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَیۡنَیۡنِ
english: Have We not made for him two eyes?

arabic: وَلِسَانࣰا وَشَفَتَیۡنِ
english: And a tongue and two lips?

arabic: وَهَدَیۡنَـٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَیۡنِ
english: And have shown him the two ways?

arabic: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ
english: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.

arabic: وَمَاۤ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ
english: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?

arabic: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
english: It is the freeing of a slave

arabic: أَوۡ إِطۡعَـٰمࣱ فِی یَوۡمࣲ ذِی مَسۡغَبَةࣲ
english: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger

arabic: یَتِیمࣰا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ
english: An orphan of near relationship

arabic: أَوۡ مِسۡكِینࣰا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةࣲ
english: Or a needy person in misery

arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِینَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡا۟ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ
english: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.

arabic: أُو۟لَـٰۤىِٕكَ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَیۡمَنَةِ
english: Those are the companions of the right.

arabic: وَٱلَّذِینَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔایَـٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَـٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
english: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.

arabic: عَلَیۡهِمۡ نَارࣱ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ
english: Over them will be fire closed in.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا
english: By the sun and its brightness

arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا
english: And [by] the moon when it follows it

arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا
english: And [by] the day when it displays it

arabic: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا یَغۡشَىٰهَا
english: And [by] the night when it covers it

arabic: وَٱلسَّمَاۤءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا
english: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it

arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا
english: And [by] the earth and He who spread it

arabic: وَنَفۡسࣲ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا
english: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it

arabic: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا
english: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,

arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا
english: He has succeeded who purifies it,

arabic: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا
english: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].

arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَاۤ
english: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,

arabic: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا
english: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.

arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡیَـٰهَا
english: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."

arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَیۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
english: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].

arabic: وَلَا یَخَافُ عُقۡبَـٰهَا
english: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا یَغۡشَىٰ
english: By the night when it covers

arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
english: And [by] the day when it appears

arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰۤ
english: And [by] He who created the male and female,

arabic: إِنَّ سَعۡیَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ
english: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.

arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ
english: As for he who gives and fears Allah

arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
english: And believes in the best [reward],

arabic: فَسَنُیَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡیُسۡرَىٰ
english: We will ease him toward ease.

arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ
english: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need

arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ
english: And denies the best [reward],

arabic: فَسَنُیَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ
english: We will ease him toward difficulty.

arabic: وَمَا یُغۡنِی عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥۤ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰۤ
english: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?

arabic: إِنَّ عَلَیۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ
english: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.

arabic: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡـَٔاخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ
english: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].

arabic: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارࣰا تَلَظَّىٰ
english: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.

arabic: لَا یَصۡلَىٰهَاۤ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى
english: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.

arabic: ٱلَّذِی كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
english: Who had denied and turned away.

arabic: وَسَیُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى
english: But the righteous one will avoid it -

arabic: ٱلَّذِی یُؤۡتِی مَالَهُۥ یَتَزَكَّىٰ
english: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself

arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةࣲ تُجۡزَىٰۤ
english: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded

arabic: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَاۤءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ
english: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.

arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ یَرۡضَىٰ
english: And he is going to be satisfied.

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ وَٱلضُّحَىٰ
english: By the morning brightness

arabic: وَٱلَّیۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
english: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,

arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
english: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].

arabic: وَلَلۡـَٔاخِرَةُ خَیۡرࣱ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ
english: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].

arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ یُعۡطِیكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰۤ
english: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.

arabic: أَلَمۡ یَجِدۡكَ یَتِیمࣰا فَـَٔاوَىٰ
english: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?

arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَاۤلࣰّا فَهَدَىٰ
english: And He found you lost and guided [you],

arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَاۤىِٕلࣰا فَأَغۡنَىٰ
english: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.

arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡیَتِیمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ
english: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].

arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّاۤىِٕلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ
english: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].

arabic: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ
english: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].

arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ
english: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?

arabic: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ
english: And We removed from you your burden

arabic: ٱلَّذِیۤ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ
english: Which had weighed upon your back

arabic: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ
english: And raised high for you your repute.

arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ یُسۡرًا
english: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ یُسۡرࣰا
english: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.

arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ
english: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].

arabic: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب
